item.text: rgya gar skad du/
pany+tsabang sha tesA si kA pradzA/
shes rab kyi pha khol du phyin
'a@#// thog ma/ sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
phyag 'tshalaspro/ 'du skyed bdag gis thos pos gcig na/bcom ldan 'das
'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/
gnyis
nyon mos pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa// sams shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang
shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas te/ byed pa byas la/ khur bor ba/rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba
yosasu zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sams shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sams kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin
ba'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang brag gcig ma gtogs ba ni/'di lta nga slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshad ldan pa dga'
bo'o dag slong ma grags 'dzin dang/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang/ dag bsnyan dang/ ga
bstan ma shin tumang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po tshad med grangs
med thams cad kyang gcus rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod tshul can/
rtog pamadapa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad lamanyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tuthob ba/ thog
bamadapa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstag pa zad mi shes pa la sos yang dag pa rig pa'i tshul khong chud pa/mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam
rtsa ba mngon par shes pa shanitum nyams pa/mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ lulemad ni brtson 'grusu brtsams pa/ lus dang srog
la mi lta ba/tshul 'chos pa med//kha gsag med pa/grags pa dang/ kha dang/ bkur sti'isamasamadapa/zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa chos
tsazabamo'i bzo dab dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pachen bo thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum pa med pa// bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun
chad ba/ las dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ bur sgrol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis ma non pa/ nyan thos dngarang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs pa
dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbya zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grangs med panas smona'am shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ sngon du skyakha/ khro/
gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad ba'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa// zhum pa'i sems dang bral ba/ spobs pa mchod pa 'khor mtha'i pa ba
la gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/bskal pa bye bamatha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa// chos thams cad sgyus dang/ smig rgyudang chu zla dang/ rmi lam dang/
sgra brnyan dang/ mag yor dang/ nam mkha' dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang/ sprul pa dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bur khong duchud pa/ sams yongs su zhum pa med ba/sems can tham cad kyi soms kyi
rgyud dang/ shes pa phra ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ chos pa khong du chud par bya ba'amakhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sams dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ tshes/
thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par phuba'i lo shasal mkhas ba/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/ rangag mas la dbang rab tu thob ba/ chos//
thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/las dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ lta ba'i sgrib ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel bar
'byakha'i tshul zad mi shes pa ' gzhugs ba/ lto ba dang/ bag la nyal pa dang/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams cad sangs ba/ las dang nyon mongs
bawams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes lemakhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mos pa// chos
kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa 'jigs pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnamaM par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis
'gro ba yongs su zin pa// 'jig rten kyi khams grangs med dpag tu med ban bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas
byung ba thams cad du zhu bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/ soms can gyi lta ba rnam ba sna tshogs kyi chos yongs su bskyod pa'i nyon mongs
gzhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgyaso mngon par bsgrub ba 'gar rtsi ba'i la shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ yon zhabarjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par ma zad ba dang ldan/
pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang/ rin chen 'byung gnas dang rin chen snying po dang/ rin chen byin ba dang/
ded dpon dam pa dang/ skyes bus byin dang/ skyob sbad dang/ chu bdag lha dang/ dbang pos kun dngo/ bzang po'i stobs dang/ blo gros dam pa dang/ 'phags
ba'i blo gros dang/ blo gros 'phal ba dang/ blo gros mtha' yas dang/ don bod mtho ba dar/ sgrib mod blo gros dang/ rab tu zhugs pa dang/ mthu dmangs rnam bar gnon
ba dang/ brtson 'grus macu' yas dang/ sogatu'artson pa dang/ rtogatu sbyor gnang/ ma gtong bar brtson pa dang/ nyi ma'i snying po dang/ zla ba'i snying po dang/ glo gros dpa mod
pa dang/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang/ mthu chen po thob pa dang/ 'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang/ rdo rje blo gros dang/ lag na rin
chan phyag dang/ rtag tulog rkyang dang/ snying rje cher soms dang/ rgyan chen bo nga/ rnam par bkod pa'irgyal po dang/ ri bo'i zom dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po khyams ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khri'i brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/
tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan sang ge'i khri bshams nas/ sku drang por bsrang ste dgongs ba mngon du bzhag nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang
du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang/ khongs su chud pa dang/ rjes su 'brang ba dang/ 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhag go/ de nas
mo ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen bas/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas sku

thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye sta/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil ga9sa kyi rtsakhor lo rtsa bis stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug nu drug tu byung ngo// zhabs gyi sor mo bcu las
kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drugahu drug tu byung ngo// zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang/ zhabs kyi sbyin pa gnyis dang/ zhabs pus mo gnyis dang/ zhabs brla gnyis dang
sku sta zur gnyis dang/ skalte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ sku rtsibs log gnyis dang/ thugs ka'i skyas bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu
dru gzhu byung ngo// phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug tu drug tu byung ngo// de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang/ sku phrag pa gnyis dang/ mgur dang/
tshams mcho ba bzhi dang/ tshems bzhi bcu dang/ spyan gnyis dang/ stan gnyis dang/ shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang/ stang gi spyi/

gtsug dang/ zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug tu byung// 'od khrir bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis[0f8b]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho dang/ nub
dang / byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang rog dang/ stong ga phyogs su phyogs pa'i zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bang+ga'i klung gi bya cha
snyad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ 3sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang/ 'od zer des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i byang chug tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu 'gye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stongo gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab pa byas so// shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gats+tsha'i klung gi bye ma snyad snang ba chen pos khyab bar byas so// lho dang//
nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang/ stang gi phyogasu phyogs de re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gapa'i
khyim snyad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gas 'od de mthong ba dang/ 'od des gang la reg bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chug tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba
chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su brdzag rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi rtsom snyad snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang shar lho dang
tshe lho nub dang/ nub byang sa phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang/ stong gaphyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// sems
can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang/ 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas lcags kyi dbang po bkram sta/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad lcags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do////

ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/ 'od zer de dag thams cad la pad+momang bo rin po chasna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang
tha 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ tsa lin+das ltar rig na bde bar gyur pa sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur

te pad+mo do dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ 'di lta sta/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+ga'i klungag bye ma snyad du gshegs shing/ de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa re chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to// de dag lho dang/ nub
dang / byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ log dang/ stang gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+ga'i klung ga khyim sAd du gshegs shing/ de dag tu byon nas kyang/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/
sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang/ blon chod pa yang dag par lcogs pa'i byang chun tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das

nyid kyis gdan sa nga ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin sang ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya bal mnyam par gzhag sta/ rdzu'aphrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon
bar du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigarten gyi khams 'di rnamapa drug tugayos te/ g.yos so// rab tugayos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul ho// rab tu 'gul
do kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go/ 'dun tu ldeg go/ chem cham/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu'ur 'un/ kun tu 'ur 'ur re/
gshig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' sto/ daladus bag da4 kyis nyams su bde bar soms can
thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skad bar gyur to/ de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsamakha cig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'og rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba
dang / byol song gi skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ mi khomapa dang/ ngan song dang/ ngan 'gro dang/ log bar ltung kha gang ji snyad cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun
chad cing stongs par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de bzhin du rgyalachen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang/ sumacu rtsa gsum dang/ mtsham dang/
dga' ldan dang// 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang/ mi de dag dga' ba dang/ mos pa dang/ nyams
bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran po'agyur ti/ rjes su dran nas dga' ba dang mos pa dang/ nyams bde ba thob 'gyur ba de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing
phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams b+hApa'i klung gi bye ma snyad dang/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams rnams dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs le le zhing 'jig rten gyi
khams gda' kyang ga bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang phyol song gi sku gnas thams cad dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par
gyur te/ sems M can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang/ lha de dag dga' bo dang/ mos pa dang/ nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe
rabs rjes sun par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang/ mos pa dang/ nyams bde ba thob gyur ba de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ dbazhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa bad dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong shing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal to/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor mi 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tsho stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmus long stodacig yodapa
de dag thams cad kyang ga gse gzugs mthong bar gyur to// bon ba rnams kyang rnabs sgra thos par gyur to/ smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// sems 'khrugs ba rnams kyang 'khrug
gamed pa'i ng mas thob bar gyur to// gos kha ba rnams kyang ges yo bar gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to// bkres ba rnams kyang bras thob par gyur to// skom

! rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to/ lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshong ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to// la ba
nams kyar la sos par gyur to// lus dang/ ga dang/ yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang/ 'tshob ma dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang 'aa dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang/ 'tsho
ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dparan pa dang/ mo dang/ phunudang/ sring mo dang/ mdza' ba dang/ gnyen pa dang/ grogs po
dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun du sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshags par spyod pa dang/ gtsang ba dang/ nyig pa'i
dri nga ba yod de/ mi dge ba'i rtog gsas cad dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par byed/ dporan dgoslong bsam gtan gsum pa la so/
bar zhus pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'ad lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur to/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o// dul ba/
ni dge go/ zhi ba ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o/ bden pa na dge ba'o// bag khyed ba ni dge ba'o/ byams kha na dgakhako/ snying sngon dge ba'o// tshangs par spyod ba spyad pa/
ni dge ba'o// srog chags su gyur pa thams cad me 'tsho ba 'di ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ de bcom ldan 'das gdan song ge'i khra sde nyid la bzhugs
bsa'adi lta ste/ dper na ka bsgrigs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyangs longs su dag pa la dug ba'am/ zla btaba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab
u@#/// dang bas ba/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas ba/ dbang po dang bcas kha/ dbang byed dang bcas pa// lha dang lha ma yin gyi las dang bcas pa/tshangs
pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'diwal gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi ngo di dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lcam ma/ lhan ne/ ltung go/
lta bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lham lag
khan/ ltad der bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'gyig rten gyi khams kazla'i klung gi bye ma snyad zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gabi brjid dang/ dpal
gyis mdzes shing lham mi/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// lho dang/ nub dang/ lce dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ [0f8b]nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og
dang / stong gi gas kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lcam mo//
lhan no/ lhang nger bzhugs so// 'di lta ste/ dpon ri'i rgyal kho ri rab ni ri nag bo gzhan thams cad zhal gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'di
lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro
gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham ma/ lhan no/ lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs
ba dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang/ sku mdog dpa/ gzi brjid dang/ dbal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang ngeko
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ca'adra ba de bzhin du bstan to// de nas stong gsum
gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang/ kun snang dang ba dang/ tshangs ras dang/ gzhan 'aphrul da bang byed dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ dag la ldan dang/
mtsho ma dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang jisod pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sasargyas gdan sang gi'i TI
la bzhugs ba mthong nas dga' zhing spro ba dang/ yid bde zhing pa tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ lhordzus kyi lo tog dang/ 'byung ba dang/ spos dang/ khyugs pa
dang bya ma dang/ lha rdzas kyi khyug spos dang/ lha rdzas kyi ut+pal dang/ bad+mo dang/ ku mu da dang/ pun da ra ka dang/ na lan dang/ so'u gan d+hi dang/ lha rdzas kyi
ma tog ke sa ra dang/ ta ma la'i lo ma dang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der dong sta phyin nas lo tog dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ sos dang/ byug pa dang/ bla ma dang/ bdug spos dang/ ut+pal dang/ pad+mo dang/ ku mu da dang/ pund raka dang
na la nadang/ so'u gan d+hi dang/ ma tog ke sa ra dang/ tam la'i lo ma dang/ lha rdza sakyin bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha rdzas kyi ba dan dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la ga tor to// mngon bar gtor to// rab tu gtor to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang/ snod du gyur pa'i mi rje snyad cig bod pa de dag
kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang/ thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dongs byin cing/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// ma tog dang/ 'phrang
ba dang/ sos dang/ phyug pa dang/ phyi ma la sogs pa dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi na gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i stong gi nam mkha' la lo tog la sogs ba'i khang ba brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du rtsed de
gnas bar gyur to// khang ba brtsegs ba de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi mang bo 'byung bar gyur to// man par 'phyang la ragyur to/ rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to//ma tog dang dar

gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shanatu mdzes bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin tu mdzes shang lcam ma/
lhan na/ lhang nger gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang/ bcom ldan
'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang/
stong ga phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang/ nom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi
mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku khalta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams jiltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba glang spyod dang/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dang/ byang ga sgra mi snyan dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
kyi lha rnams dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang/ de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khal
kyi mi thams cad dang/ lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na
bzhugs shing sa son to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan song ge'i khra de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu 'gyu ba mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar phyogs dang/ lho dang/ nub dang byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs

mtshams dang/ 'og dang/ stang gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi ma snyad rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
na sems can gang jisnyad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtan gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
(sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang bo mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du'ajig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gtogs pa'i sems can/
rnams kyi lho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang stong gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
ga'i klung gi bye ma sgod dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang tha bas cig tu bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi phyi ma
sAd bo de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyid cig 'khod pa de dag gis kyang/ stong gsum gyi stong chon po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
gang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du khyu dang/ nub dang/

byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang/ stong gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyod po de dag na//
sems can gang ji snyid cig 'khodo ba de dag gis kyang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dba'i 'khor dang grub sa ci/tu bzhugs ba mthong bar gyur to/
de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams ga 'i ngag byi ma snyad 'das pa kun gyi ba rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
khang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong sta/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang
dag bar ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khogs de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas phyung ba zhes bya la ltadug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang sa'o/
gsos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mtho de nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshog saM pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung
lho/ gnas gang na ba der song de phyin nas/ bcomo ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byed
ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gdo ra ba 'di'i phyi'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pan chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi
khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad 'das ban/ 'jag rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong go/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dbal chen po rnams la shes ba kyi bkol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'dzin ri'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol
to bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khamos mi mad der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thub ba de blta ba dang/ de la
blag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyura'/ gzungs dang so so lang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nga
'ag dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'chi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'anichen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
u// kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab bar shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs ba rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas/

byang ba la/pad+mo 'di bo che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mgo can 'dab ma stong dang ldan ba stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das sun ma mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dra ste/
pad+ma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ba zhes kyang gyis
la/ ba 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhano/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen bo de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagasheg
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/ pad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa

dang/ ba tu byung ba dang/ khye 'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi las sa rgyas bcom
ldan 'das gang ji sAd cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la lo tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ bya ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bste stang du bya ba dang/ mchod par khyod cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/
byang chub sa mas dpa'i mthu chen bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gnag tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung las/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan mi mang 'am/ gnod pa mamanyis sam
tho mdog bde 'am/ skunyams dang ldan nas/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri sta/ basmyogaser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dog kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pas pa de dag bzhes nas/
shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung ga khyi ma lhad po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas paNo
de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad sa bar khyab par gyur te bats+tshado dag la de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku mang po bzhugs shang/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid bcu na
te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
khyil ba dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas M shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas go bsti stang du byas so// mchod bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lho phyog
khogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas bdag sa skya na med pa'i dbal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang/

dag par ston pa mdzad do/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen bo de dang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs
ba'i sku blta na tshig gi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
'das de ba zhinagshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dbal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dog sa'ang ltar cher gas pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ci rgyatsa'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dbal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan

tshad pa la 'di skadatsos bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes pa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ston te/ da ni de'i mthu smin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen khomya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dar/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs kha dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub bde blta ba dang/

do la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur ba/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rag ba bsgrub pa rab tuklob kha/ting nge 'dzin
nga snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob ba de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcos ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dbal gyis bka' stsol pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i

dusal bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la/ pad+morin po che sna tshogs kyirgyu las byung gsar gyi

mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stobaskur te/gas kyi lu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrakhacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' ma/
gnod pa ma mchis sam/ bro mdog bdo 'am/ skunyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dbazhes 'dri sta/ bad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'ad dag kyang/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med ba'i dab la gyis/bag ldan 'das la mchod pa 'i slod du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la khablo di dag gas gtor zhig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag/
yod bal spyod cig/ de ci'i phyira'o na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems M dpa' chen bo de dag na mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ don nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang ba
sams dpa' sems dba' na bo skyongan mod bas rnakhacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs kha dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan lod pa'i dbal de las(bad+mo gsagyi mdogatan

'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu khyung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ khu mo'i gzugs su 'dug ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas

kyi zhing de nas ma snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyad cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dgatsam sad lame tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug
ba dang/ khyim dang/ na bza' dang rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mdo bar byed cing/ byang chub sems
ba'i rdzu 'phrul chen ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' khyu chen bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra tsho la lar dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkyakhrub ba gang na ba de 'doste ni
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu'akhod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo mya ngan dang pas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal/com ldan 'das la snyan mi ga ra la//
gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog 'dam/ sku nyams dang ldan na'/ bad ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes '//bad+mogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bsku'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas padi dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi thag

rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bo de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de gang na ba der gtor to// de nas basmyo do dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ bodo dag

la de bzhin gshegs po'i sku mang bo bzhugs shing/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan ba de dag sems can gang gas thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla

na med payang dag par gsapa'i byang chug tunges par gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang// khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bsag
ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba la ma gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// bsti stang du byas go/ mchod bar byas nas phyogs/
gcig tu 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i krungag bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi kha khol/

tu phyin pa 'di nyid la nga dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher ga los

ba de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes ba de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phrogong na ba der song ste

nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ rtog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshog
ba'i sku 'di lta bu gda' btsa' ma'i rgyun/de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das chen 'od 'bros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bkastsal to// gis
kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pan/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yab dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyob go/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu ni pa ston ti/ 'di ni de'i mkhu yin/
te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'gro la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
ma mdzad der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs kha dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de bltab dang de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' son

dba' chen bodo dag kun kyang b.lachor gzhon nur gyur kha/ gzungs dang so so yang dag pa'i rig pa bsgrub la rab tu thob ba/ dang nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag
rgyu bltakhaslad du mako/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal ba/riyaMs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la khab bar shisan song zhig de de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen 'od 'phros/

byachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo grob la/ bad+mo bzhi bo che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur to/gas kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshe gas ba dgra bcomo pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la bcom ldan 'das snyan mi mang ra 'am/gnod pa la las sam/zo mdog bde 'am/ska nyams dang ldan nam/bad pa dang dgyes

bar sprod dam zhes 'di lta/pad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskor ro zhes kyang
gyis la bad+mo 'di dag gis gtocig/ gas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod bar spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon bo de dag/
mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der tams bar gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprod pa'i blo gros kyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog

pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las/bad+mo gsar gyi mdog can ' dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su

dug ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma snang bar gyur nas/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams

cad la me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ khyim dang/ na bza' dang rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis ram gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang//
ba/ @#/ bsti stang bubya bdang/ mchod par byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i u0f97'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dba'i mthu chen bos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thubapa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcos ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khodonas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i gangs
rtsa rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/bcom ldan 'dasal sunas mnga' lam/ gnod ba ma mchis sam/zo dog bde ma/skunyams dbaldan zham/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri sta/ pad+mogaser gyi mdog
can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa [︽]shAkya thub
bas bskyod dag bzhes nas/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bo de dag gi de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor

to/ do nas pa de dag gis 'jig rtagyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas bar khyab bar gyur ta/bad+mo do dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsam+ba
ti chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis gos bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na yod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sa mas dpa' khyim ba
dang rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa

rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gro'i phyag so bkul sku'i phyag sogs bsti stang du byas so// ma chod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams na/ng+ga'i klung ga khyi la
snyad 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'adz+dzag rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang bo nas bya ba bzhugs

shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba lang nyid yang dag bar ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams don byang chub sechu dab 'a
sams dba' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das 'od chi bo 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/dog sa 'di la'achor gsos ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i skul la shugada' ba 'di mi'i rgya se'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol
shag dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang bos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas lnga phyogs logs su 'jig

rtan gyi khams gang+ga'i klung ga phyi ma snyad 'das ba na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de na bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bad rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs

shing 'tsho skyong ngo// nga byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ 'di ni nga'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rgyal bas byin gyis/ nyomi ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba rgyal ba'i dbang bo la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ma mjed der/ bcom lda'adas
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomo ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun

kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur ba/ gzungs dang so so yang dag bar rig pa sgrub ba khab tu thob ba/ ting nge 'dzin dang goms par 'jug ba thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchako/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang bos bka' stsal pa/cigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab pa na shes na so bzhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs ba rgyal ba'i dbang pos byang chub sems

dba' sems dpa' chen kho rgyal bsabyin la/ pad+mo ni botsho sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gsar rgyag gog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob 'degabcom ldan 'das snyan mi chab r ma/gnod pa ma mchis sam/mdog bde 'ol/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde pa dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri
lta pad+mogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang na ba 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang bos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskor ro zhes kyang gyis la/ ba
'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi khu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der khag yod par spyod ga/ de ci'i phyir na/ 'jig rten kyi khams der skyes ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de dag ni 'gu
bar dka' ba yin sa/ denyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dbal chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang bo de wA/ ban+d+ho gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ btu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug
pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skad cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
skyong ba de dag thams cad la ma tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gi
la gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bas sta du bya ba dang/ mchod par byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das
bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas do bam ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas ba'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang bo/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ za mdog bde 'am/ skunyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang
dgyes bar spyod dam zhes 'dra ste/ badz+dzogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di reg kyang/ 'tshalan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyab pa'i dbang bos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i glad

wa0 dus skar ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pado dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gAkyang ga cu ma zhan po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag/

gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo di dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ patsho dadag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin

pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogosapa'i byang chub tu nges bar gyur to// byang chub
sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang// phye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug ba de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub po la sa gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// bsti stang du byas so// mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang par gyi phyogs

mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ka'i klung ga byi ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzinar bod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong// des+yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
'das bdag son ba mdzad go/ den 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dbacasamabadaba' chen bo rnam par rgyal bsa rnam par gnon ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug bas/
gang ba chen por dang ]sa ga su sad dang bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomalayang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
ting nge 'dzan gyi glang po dam la rtse dbal gang na ba der song da phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa ting nge 'dzin kyi grub po dam pa'i dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od

[– ]chon po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di mi'i rgyu mi'i skyon/ de skad ces gsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de ba yin
gshegs pa ting nge 'dzan gyi glang po dam kha'i dbal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam bar gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub
! kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi kham sa ga'i klung gi phyi ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog

ba'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo// dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te 'dra'o// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam bar rgyal ba'i rnam par gnon bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang bo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom/
ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad der/ bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing
bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzan dang
snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob la de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rig
kyi bu de ltar 'i dus la bab bar shes na song zhig// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba stong phrag nyi shu lnga ba bam bo ga nyis ba////de nas de bzhin gsheg
ga ting nge 'dzan gyi glang po dam ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal las rnam par gnon pa la/ pa na po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu la byung ba gsar gyi mdog can dpal
stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba del/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/
[kg]ga tshanod pa ma mchis sam/ blo mdog bde 'am/ skyanyams dang ldan nam/brdol dang dbyas par spyod dam zhes 'drista/ pad+mogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan ba 'di dag kyang/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam ba'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ brjod 'di dag gas gtor cig rigs kyi bu
sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag namagu bar dka' ba yin gyis dor nyams
[$ ]bar gyur ta ra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sar

rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sams dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu phyung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ du

mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyad cig

bzhugs shange 'atso skyong bde dag thams cad la me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug ba dang/ khyim dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gi

mtha rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod bar phye dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga nga na bder dong ste nyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tul khod do//
phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzarigya glang po dam ba dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan ma mapa' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ blo bdog bda'am/ sku nyams dang ldan
nas/ bad ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri sta/ paro gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal

gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+modo dag bzhes nas/ byang ba gar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung

gi bye ma snyad po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs patshesangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas paNo do dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par
'gyur te/ bdo do dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis//
thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na yod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs
su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas
t+tho so bsti stang du byas so/ ]mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sged 'das pa kun gyi parol

na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dbal zhes bya ba
bzhugs shang 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen bo rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpachen po lag na pad+mozhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cheragayos pa dadang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/
bcom nadas de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+modam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padam pa'i
dbal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar cholagayos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'ang lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i
pa'i skyon/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
do/ rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshums logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs

ba dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shange 'tsho skyong ngo// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston
te/ 'di ni ri mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo lag na pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten kyi khams ma mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bal ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
de dag kun kyang thal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag bar rag pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu rgyu
ga pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal rgyas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes nasong zhig/ de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dbal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad+mol/ pad+ma ni po co sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bska te/ rig
rdzo kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyan ma mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma matsas sam[”]/ rtsomadog
bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dra ste/ pad+mogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bad+mo
ma pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gas gtor cig/ rags kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi 'ang der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i bying chub sems dpa' sems dbo' chen po de dag na mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ dmanyams par gyur ta re danas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
tshabo lag na pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de las/ pagasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de
dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa khyo ga khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyid cig bzhugs sha 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la ma tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang
'brab b dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod
par byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chonapo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
shAkya thub pa gang na bde' dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa dam pa'i
dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la sun mi mas/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ skanyams dang ldan m/ bde ba dang dgyes par sdod dam zhes 'dri
stabad+mogs kyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan ba 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogos ba'i sangs rgyas brgyu dam pa'i dpal gyis/ barma
ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas paro de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs

mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyad po do dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzobs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// danas pad+mo de dag gis 'di

rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas pa'i khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snumang bo bzhugs shang/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/ chos
bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/rab tu byung ba dang/
khro ru dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug ba de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror
0byas so// bkur stir byas so// bsti stang du byas so// mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rtanagyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed

'das ba kun gyis rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga ngshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam

ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong sta/ do byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams
don byang chub sems dpa'i sems dba'achen po tam rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yos ba de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog ma shes pa de
mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs bama'i dkyil 'kho snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos
ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku 'di lta bu gda'o ga 'datso'i rgyuci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bar bsams pas snang ba dam pa'i dpa kha gyis bya chub sems dpa' sa mas dba' chen pota mi rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di//

sa byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mig redaces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thubu ba zhes bya ba bzhugs ring 'tsho skyong ngo// de byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di'i do' mthu yin te de 'dra'o//
donas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snangabs/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig

rten gyi khams mi 'dzad der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag rtsom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bstan bsgyur ba dang/ byang chub
bams dpa la sems dpachen bo de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur la/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzazhi dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
kha bang rab tu thob ba de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de 'dus la
ba la'ang shes song zhig rtenas de bzhin gshegs bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba'achen po'atsho btsasnang la/ pado bo che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi kha dog nad pa la stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog de 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan/
ma bde ba dang dgyes bar spyod dam zhes 'dri sta/ bad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa
dbal gyis/ bcom ldan 'di la mchod pa'i slad du pa pas bskurar zhos kyang gyis la/ pa'idi dag gas gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod ma// de ci'i phyir zhe
jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po de dag namagu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ dom nyams par gyur ta re/ donas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
ma 'batu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa'

thub pas pad+mododag bzhes nas/ lhonub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi phyi ma snyad bo de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gas rim grwar bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsdu stang du bya ba dang/ mchod par byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na pa der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'dabod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dam pas bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la san ma mnga' 'am/ kanod
rgyu ba ma mchas sam/ bromadog bde tham/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gsar kyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i dbal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskar ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
rgyu bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ ga ga phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sad po de dag
gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mod dag gas 'a jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par
khyab par gyur// bde dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang bo bzhugs shing/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid stsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can
gangags gros bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngos par gyur to// byang chu ba soms dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang
bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rab sang bdag la rits+tsha bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas
so/ bkur stir byas so// bas stang du byas so// mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas stong gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyakhams gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa
kun gyi pha rolan/ 'jig rten gyi de khams mdangs dag zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpala'i bya ba bzhugs
ka'i 'tsho skyong sta/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi 'a rol tu phyin pa'i di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang/ sacher a mos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas sku blta na chog mi shes pa de athong nas
bcom ldan 'das dga' pa'i dpal gang na ba der songs phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgu panom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa' sa ngas rgyas dga' ba'i
dbal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'a da'i rgya ci'i
na/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dba'o
zla chen po dga' bas byin pa la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas rtog ga phyogs su 'dzag rten gyi khams ga 'i klung gi phyi ma snyad 'das ba na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
cag bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo// de byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// donas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' pu byin pas/bcom ldan 'das de pa zhin gshe gra/
ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas dgar ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
0 gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang de la phyag bgyi zhing bstan bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang

bal chos gzhon nur gyur ba/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa khasgrub pa rab tu the bo pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob ba de dag blta ba'i spyad machi'o/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pi/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomo ba yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dbal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas phyin pa la/ bats+tse na bo cha sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong
dang ldan pa stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de gzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyan ma mnga' 'am/
gnod pa ma mchis sam/ blo mdog bde la/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri sta/ bad+mogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i di dag kyang/
tsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dga' ba'i dbal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod ba'i skad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ bats+tsha'adi dag gis gtor gyi// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
[p/]@#// zhing der bag yod bar spyodatsag/ deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/
[J ]der nyams par gyur ta'o/ de nas byang chub sams dpalasams dpa' chen bo dga' bas ban pas/ bcomo ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
dga' ba'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byang ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byed pa

khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ stong gi phyogs kyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ja snyad tsog bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la
ma tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gror bya
tsho ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bas stang du phya ba dang/ mchod par byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub la gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
do phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sogs dpa' chen bo dga' bas brin bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la sun ma mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zi mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde po dang
dgyes par sdod dam zhes 'dri sta/ pad+magasar gyi mdog can 'dapa ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag ra ba'i dpal gyiso/ btso ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhos nas/ stang ga phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

gang+ga'i klung ga byi la snyad po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams
cargyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo do dag la de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de soms
can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/
skye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug ba de dag gas rang rang ga dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// bsti stang du byas so// mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas de'i tsho skad cig yud tsam thang zhig la

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i rang bzhan du kun nas gnas par gyur te/ ma tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang pa dang/ dar gyi lda ldi dang chun pos kun nas bros ba
dang snod sna tshogs nas bdug spos sna tshogs 'thul ba dang/ dpag bsam gyi rgyan dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi yal ga'i rtse mo g.yur bra bo dang/ me tog gi shing dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/
spos kyi shing dang/ 'phreng ba'i shing dang/ phye ma'i shing dang pajug spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dpar na de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma tog kun nas rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa dang/ lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gzi brjid chen po dog 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pa can bzhin du gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag 1 shu lnga pa las/
gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang bo///de'i tshe de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skya
dgu dang bcas ba/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa mang po tshogs pa dang/ pang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur ba mang po de dag 'dus par thugasasu chud/
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs
bar 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bam ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams rud du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa
med pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin ba dang/ gtong ba dang/ yongs su len pa la dmigs ba'i phyir/ longs su btang ba med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
so/ngas su rdzogs par bya'o// byung ba dang ma byung ba ba ba chod pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyis tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogos par bya'o// 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzo gas par bya'o/ lus dang sogs kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa'i phyir/ partson 'grus kyi phalol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'o myob pa med pa spyi'i/ bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// chos thams cad mi dmags pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya// shA ra dwa ti'i yu byang chub sems dpa'i
sems dpal chen 'os shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te napa ma dam sa ba'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ yang dag par spong ba
bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang bo lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs bar bya'o//
stong ba nyid kyi ting ngo 'dzan dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzazhi dang/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyadadang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ rnam par bam pa' 'du shes dang/
zi bu can gyi 'du shes dang/ rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par 'byor
ba'i 'du shes dang/ rus pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par rig pa'i 'du shes dang/ zas la pa mthun pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos Nes su dran pa dang/ dmed/

'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran ba dang/ gtob rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa dang/ dbugs phyin ng rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang/ skya ba rjes su dran pa dang/ tshig rjes su dran pa/

dang (lus kyi rnam pa rjesasu dran pa dang/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang/ mi sdug ba'i 'du shes dang/ 'tsho ba'i 'du shes dang/ 'jig rten thams
cad la dga' bar mi bya ba' 'du shes dang/ 'jig rten thams cad l yidi brtan du mi rung ka'i'adu shes dang/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang/ kun 'byung ba shes pa dang/ 'gag pa shes pa dang/ las
shes pa dang/ zad pa shes pa dang/ ma skye ba shes pa dang/ chos shes pa dang/ rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang/ kun rdzob shes pa dang/ 'dris dam pa shes pa dang/ sgra dzibazhin ge

ba bsgom par bya'o// rnam par rtog pa dang bcas/ rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas ba'i ting nge 'dzazhi dang/ rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzane dang/ rnam par rtog pa med cing
rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya pa'i dbang po dang/ kun shes pa'i dbang po dang/ kun shes ba rig pa'i dbang po dang/
bral gyis gnon pa'i sku mched dang chub pa'i sku mchod dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang/ rnam par dgod pa bzhi dang/ sa bcu dang/ spyod pa 'acu dang/ bad pa bcu dang/ lhag
'kha sam pa nyi shu dang thams cad mkhyen ba'i ye shes dang/ gzhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa dang/ rig pa gsum dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi
lce dang ma nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nor bdun dang/ skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad dang/ sems can gyi gnas dgu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
staglacu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ nga rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ gtang snyoms chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// rnamakha/
! thams cad mkhyen pa'i la shes rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa dang/ thams cad shes pa dang sems can
thams cad kyi sems dang/ spyod pa dang/ shes pa'i rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya par 'dod pa byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
brtson par bya'o// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson bar bya ste/

shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'das rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa shes par 'dod pa dang/ sa de dag las 'da' bar 'dod pa dang/
bya'i ma ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa dang/ mngon par shes pa drug la gnas par 'dod pa dang/ sems can thams cad kya soms dang spyod pa rnam par g.yo ngo shes par 'dod pa dang/ nyan thos
dar dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zil gyas gnon par 'dod pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzani gya sgo mang po thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
shes rab kyi 'go rtayun pa la bslab bar bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa gtong ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzug
su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam pa'i
ba da gro la ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i langashes mthong ba rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
na kyi bsam gtan dang/ rnam bar l pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang lan bsams bskyed pa gcig gas thol gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i byang chub
