gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gnas na/ de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma ngon par 'du bgyi ba la snyed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma sod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
spyi mngon par 'du bgyi ba la sred pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la
snyoms par 'jug pa ra ma 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs na yongs su bzung ba ma mchis te/ gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang/ rang bzhin gyis stod pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags//
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang/rang sAka'o
gyis stong pa'i smad du rnam par shes pa ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang
rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stod pa'i slad du yodAsu bzung ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byed pa'i tshe/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi// ci nas
kyad chos gang la yang yid la pa'i rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ches thams
cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste/ rgya che ba/ phul du bgyi ba/ tshad ma mchis par nges pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'phrogs shing/ de dag dang
byabyad/ thun mong ma lags pa/ ted de 'dzan gyi dkyil 'khor de la bod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar

'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stod pa nyid dang/ don dam pa/
zla stod pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa

dol nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 1de stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa go/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar
blo/ mtshan ma las nyon mongs ba bzung ste/ mtshan ma de dag gang zhe na/ gzugs ni mtshan ma'o// tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o// 'du shes na mtshan ma'o// 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o// rnam parnashe
la ni mtshan ma'o// mig na mtshan mgo/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid na mtshan ma'o// gzugs na mtshan ma'o// sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/
tshos ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/
ud kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus pa rig pa dang/lus kyi 'dus
te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba na mtshan ma'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg
ba las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshog zhi mtshan ma 'o//
sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o// chu'i khams dang/ mo'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dad 2 rnam par shes pa'i khams na mtshan a'o// a ragab ni mtshan ma'o//
'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ reg pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ srid pa dang/ len pa dang/ srid pa dang/ skye ba dang rga sha ni
mtshan ma'o// sbyin pa'i wA rol tu phyin pa na mtshan la'o// tshul khruses kyis ko tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam
bya/ dgatan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na mtshan ma'o// snang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o// phra stod pa nyid dad/ phyi nang stod pa nyid dang/
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar na mtshan ma'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag ba rnams ni mtshan ma'/yad dag par song ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang//
dbang bo rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ phying chus kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dad/ bsam gtan
rnams dad/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs yod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/
stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes ba rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dwang/ gzungs kyi sku rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
khas 'acu dang/ mi 'jigs pa 'an dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud ni mtshan ma'o// yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma'o// gcig tu
brjod ba ni mtshan ma'o// gnyis su kharjod pa ni mtshan ma'o// tha dad du brjod pa ni mtshan ma/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'i// gal te de ltar mtshon mar gzung ba zhig lags na ni/
kun tu rgyu 'phrad ba can yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bad la dad pa thob par ma 'gyur ro/ dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta sku/ shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la yid ches
ba dang/ rtog pa dang/ mos pa dang/ na ba dang/ sams pa dang/ 'jal ba dang/ dpyod pa sa/ de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan s ma mchis pa'i tshul du
yang ma mchis so// de ltar na de ni mtshan ma dang/ mtshan ma mchis pa dang/ yongs su bzung la ma mchis pas yongs su bzung ba lags t+taM/ kun tu rgyu 'phreng ba can des kyang/ thams
cad mkhyen pa'i ya shes bad la mos par gyur nas/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas 1 tsha ba'i yu shas kyis zhugs te/ de ltar zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo// de na 'di ltar nges par rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa ma dmigs pa/ de ci'i slad du zhi na/
'di ltar des ye shes de rtogs pa dang thob bar bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nung du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ yi shes de rtogs pa dang/ thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su
ma mthong/ yi shes de rtogs pa dang/ thob par 'gyo ba'i tshul gyis phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ ya shes de rtogs pa dang/ thob par 'gyi pa'i tshul kyis de las gzhan du yang
dag bar rjes su ma mthong ngo// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar des tshes gang kas rtogs par 'gyu ba dang/ gang rtogs par 'gyod pa dang/ gang rtogs ra kyi ba/
ka par rjes su a ma lod sku/ des ye shes gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ ya shes de tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes
pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rdzas su ma mthong/ yi shesadatsor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/'du byed dang/ rnam bar shes
ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ya shes de gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ ye shes de tshor ba dang/ 'a du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i
gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ ye shes de gzugs ma lags pa gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ yi shes de tshor kha dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ma
lags pa gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ a shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i pha rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma
mgong/ ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag bar rjes su ma mthong/ ye shes do yad dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// rnam grangs 'di la

[ns; ]kun tu rgyu 'phreng ba can mos par gyur te/ de ltar chos par gyur nas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar gyi sgo/ chos thams cad ma dmigs pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/
ma shes la zhugs par gyur te// de de ltar mos par gyur nas/ des chos gang yang mtshan ma mamachis pa dang/ yid la brgya kha ma 'chis pa'i slad du/ yongs su bzung ba ma mchis te/ chos
thams cad gzung du ma mchis/ gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ yongs su gzung bar bgyi 'a 'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des ma dmigs te/ chos thams cad la
rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/ da ni@# ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma 'chis pa'i
smad tu/ gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ bdu byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzan pa dang/ chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma ka ches
ba'i slad du/ skye mched dang/ khams dang na cing 'brel bar 'byud ba dang/ ba rol tu khyen pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dad/ byang chub kyi phul/sa kyi chos rnams dang/
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang/ mtha'
dgyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhigashAkas pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ mngon par
'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su ma 'dzan pa
klu 'di ni pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'on kyang smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma der yongs
su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs yang dag bar skyod ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa
bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ son ba yod pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge
[f ]ba dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhu dang/ so so yang dag bkage ba bzhi dad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
ba bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs bar/ bar ma dor yo ngos su mya ngan las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam rnams ni smo na lam ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/
rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams ma lags/ yang dag par song rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams dang/ dbang bo rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag/
rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'bags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
ba rnams dang/ rnam par thar ba brgyad dang/ maThar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan lta yod pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa
rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par 'ge pa bzhi dang/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang a lags/ chos ma lags la yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos
gzung ba'i slad du/ apa'i mtha'i bar la la ro la tu 'tshig sa ral gyi ba rol mas+sa mnas pa de gcas pas so// tshong pa nyid stong
ga dang/ chos thams cad yongs du ma gzung 'a'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su ma 'dzin pa 'di ni/ rgyud chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba'o[}]bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dbab sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang/ shes

sgyurab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig/ ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi sku/ byang chub semA
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhade ma dmagis pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes
bod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma sod de// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ dats+tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma

gang rnams med cing ma dmags pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan ba shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid deng/ stong pa nyid stod ba nyid/
dad/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas spyod pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa spyod pa nyer
ba stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyidi dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ ma dmigs pa stod pa nyid dang/
dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po yod pa'i de kho nyid stod pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa med cing ma dmigs so// bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang/ 'azod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi kha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing
ma dmags so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stod pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stod pa nyid dang/ don
dam la stod pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong ba nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa
nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ ma demigs pa stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo/
ka@#// nyid stod pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i de bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dad/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes

pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stod pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam

pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ ma dmagis pa stong pa chud dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ de bo nyid stong pa nyid/
dad/ dngos bo med pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ skye mched rnams dang/ khams rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med cing ma dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/

nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med cing ma dmigs so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mad cing ma dmigs so//
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang 2 bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med ba rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis
[8. ]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med cing ma dmigs so/ nang stong pa nyid
dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing ma dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyis ni bod pa'i 'bras bu dang/
dgu bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing ma dmags so// nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ de bzhin nyid med cing ma dmigs so// ma nor ba de 'azhan nyid dad/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid
dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing ma dmigs so/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'ar gyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa yang med cing mi
dmags so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong pa dang dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ sangs rgyas kyang mad cade ma dmigs so// tsho dang/
daldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid med cing ma dmigs so// phyi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi skyod pa nyid med cing ma dmigs so//

phyi nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa rted med cing ma dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i de kho nyidi skyod pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
nad cade ma dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog nyid sems pa dang//
de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe sams zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med la/ mi 'jigs ma sdong skrag par ma 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// sa 'a/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'khyer ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes
parakhya/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la sod pa'i tsha/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du byed na 'du byed
kyi rad bzhin dang bral ba/ rnam par shes pa na rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byad chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
mad dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched dad khams dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin/
dang bral ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral la/ nung stod pa nyid na nang skyod pa/
nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa nyid kyi bar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/
yang dag par song ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzha dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
khargyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/
[7] ]@#// do rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon
bar shes pa rnams dang/ tid de 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
wa7 dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rgyun du zhugs pa na rgyun du zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba//
lan cig phyir 'ad ba dang/ phyir ma 'ong pa dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang byang chub dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dad
bral ba/ de bzhin nyid na de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan la yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyangs dang/
chos kyi gnas dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' na yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen
bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang la
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par byago/ sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin na dza le'u/ tshor ba dang//
'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam ba shes pa'i rang 'azhin ni ji lta bu/ skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhan na ja lta 'u/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i
bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos bo med khago/ tshor ba dad 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang//
rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin na dngos po med pa'i// skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rung bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang
bzhin ni dngos po med pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang//
rnam par shes ba la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ skye mched rnams la skya mchod kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ khams rnams la khams kyi rang bzhin yod pa dang/ rten cing 'brel

par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par rig par bya'o// tsho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
'bya// gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes ba la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do//
rgya skad rnams la skye mched kyi mtshan nyid med do// khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'tshan nyid med do//
yang dag kha'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid med do// mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// mtshan nyid kyi rang 'azhan la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/
gas kha/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram 1
ra'i 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po gang bsab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung

bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de na bod ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad
ma skyes ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang ma dmigs/ 'byung ba yang ma dmigs so// tshor
ba dang/ bdu shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang ma dmakes/ 'byung ba yang ma dmigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag
ba'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang ma dmigs/ 'byung ba yang ma dmigs so/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu 1 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

la rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji ltar dza ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yod su dag pa dang/
ngag yongs su dag pa dang/ sams yodas su dag pa dang/ mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang/ ngag yongs su dag pa dang/
sams yongs su dag pa dang/ mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par gyur pa de lta de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyid do// zhe sdang
dang ldan pa dang/ gti mug dang ldan pa dang/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang/ g.yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang/ phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang/ srid pa dang ldan pa dang/ lta ba dang
ldan pa'i sangs ma skyod do// de 'dod chags kyi sems ma skyed cing/ zhe sdang dang/ gti zhun dang/ nga rgyal dang/ g.yo dang/ sgyu dang/ phrag dog dang 2 ser sna dang/
srid pa dang/ lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyod pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ khor zug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can
yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du ma gtogs par rnam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar ma 'gyur ro// de sems can yongs su sAn par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
zla khyed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro/ nam bla na rtsod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du/ nam
yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar ma 'gyur ro// de bas na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang ligs la
'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus ma btang bar sad par bya sta 1 tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sams dpa' sems

spyi dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyo bar gyur pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u
lnga pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bde chub sems dpa'/
[z]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ thabs la mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed
dang/ rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/
rnam par shes pa rtag ces bkyi bar skyed na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs la rtag rjes brgya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang//
rnam par shes pa ma rtag ces bal bar spyod na mtshan ma la rgyud de// gal te gzugs 'di zhes bgyi bar byed na mtshan ma la spyod de/ 1tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
'du khyed dang/ rnam par shes pa 'di zhes bgyi bar stod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi 'ar spyod na mtshan ma la sad de// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar skyed na mtshon cha la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar du na mtshan ma la spyod do// chor ba dang/
'du shes dang/ 'du khyed dang/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces brgya par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar byed na mtshon cha la skyod de//
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar rtsod na mtshan ma la stod do// gal te gzugs zhi
za zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dad/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la phyed do// gal te gzugs ma zhe
zhes bkyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa a zhi zhes brgya bar da na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs/
sku dben zhes bgyi bar skyed na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar byed na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzul/
mi dben zhes ba bar sadan mtshan ma la sbyor ro// tshor kha dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ma dben zhes bgyi ba sod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
zhi gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srid pa'i tsho ]thobs la mkhas pas skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung
ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams
dang tshad bod pa rnams dad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa noms dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug dku dang/ stod la
nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzan rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag pa dang/ ma rtag pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/
bdag dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zha ba dang/ ma zhib dwang/ dben pa dang/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'/
sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ 'di snyam du bdag nase shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de zhes bgyi 'ar spyod na/ dmagis pa la byed pa ste/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da na mtshan ma la sad de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ad snyam du/ gang de ltar spyod pa na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sod do// de na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan ma nyid la byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i thabs la mkhas par rage par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces sas so// tshe dang/
ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis sas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shade bad shes te khyon gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing bdu shes te can
kyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rna ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang 2 sdug bsngal ba
! dang / yid ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma rgol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma grol bar brjod do// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam
par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ da rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de na skyo ba
dang/ sgo kho dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las 'ongs su ma grol sdug
00 'gal chen po las yongs su mi grol bar mdzad do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ mag la mos shade bad shes te phyin
gyis rlob/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yade la mos shadu 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ sku dang 2 dri dang/
ro dang/ reg dang/ chos la mos shing 'du shes de byin gyis rlob/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes de byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes
pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shade bdu shes te phyin kyis rlob/ mi ga 'dus pa lug la la mos shing 'du shes te/
byin gyis rlob/ rnapa'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te/

phyin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing bdu shes te byin gyis rlob 2 rna 'a'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor kha dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang [Y]
lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor la la mos shing 'du shes te phyin kyis rlo'/ ma
rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ reg pa dang tshon pa
sred pa dang/ len pa dang/ srid pa dang/ skye ba dang rgo el mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ pa rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs
kyi chos rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thal
brgyud dang/ mthoragyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ ston pa med pa dang 2 mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ mig lnga dang/
ting nge 'dzan rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dad/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing bdu shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te phyin gyis rlob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang/ rgo ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ pe sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid
00/ mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug ba las yongs su mi 'grel/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su ma 'grol bar brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa ra sems dpa'

chen bo de na nyan thos kyi sa bas rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang mngon du bya ba'i skal ba medu na/ zla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta ci smos te/
de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'u/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin kha la de ltar skyed na/ thabs ma mkhas par shes par bya'o//
sus pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar skyed na thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis
lcas ba/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cid/ gzugs la ma yed/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la la spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la ma skyed/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la ma spyod/gzugs
rtag ces bya bar mi phyed/ gzugs ma rtag ces bya ba dang/ gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs sdug bsngalaM zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang/ gzugs bdag
dmod ces bya ba dang/ gzugs zhwa zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs ma zha zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs la song zhes bya pa dang/
gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ gzugs son pa yod ces bya ba dang/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang/
gzugs ma dben zhes bya bar ma spyod pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi byed/ ga ces bya ba dad bde zhes bya ba
dang sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang/ bdug ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya kha dang/ zha zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhe zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ ma stong zhes bya ba dang/
mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ na pa med ces bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ mi dbenazhes bya bar mi spyod kha de'i tshe/
khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/
stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las kud na yang stong ba nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong ba nyid do// tshor ba dang//
'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i stod pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yani/ stong pa nyid las chud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam bzhes pa las
gud na yang stong ba nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam bar shes ba/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye mched dad/ khams dang 2 rtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang//
pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong ba nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dad/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa
rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan
ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mdon par shes ba rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'gi
ba bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sangs
rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las rgud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhed/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid mod de/ stong pa nyid kyang/
wa[j]@#/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong ba nyid de// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rtag
kyipha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o//1 shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po bcu gcig pa//
tsa1/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa3 chen po shes rab kyi b+ha sel du phyin pa la de lta spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rje gas pa'i

byang chub tu mngon par 'atshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod de// de ni sha/ snyapa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod de zhes bu par mi dmags se/ mi spyod kyang mi phyed de zhes bya bar mi dmigasase/

spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyad cagabya ba mi dmigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba na mi dmigs so// smras pa/ tsha dang ldan pa rdab 'byon ci'i phyir na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rdol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rgyu/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi sed cagal ba yang mi dmigs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod
kyang mi spyod ces bya ba'ang mi dmigs/ spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya ban yang mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
de ni 'di ltan shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyi ti/ da mi'i bu'i zhi na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi yarol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te// tshe dang ldan/
pa par da ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rub kyi pha sel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsi/ spyod de nas bya bar yang mi dmigs so// ma spyod do zhes
phya ba'i ya nga mi dmigs// spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod de zhes bya ba yang mi dmigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i
phyi zhen ( 'di ltab des ches thams cad dngos po med pa'i nga bzhin du leng du chud cing ma blangs pa'i pha/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dza na ches thamus
na skye ba med pa zhes bya bste/ rgya che ba mchog tu byu ba tshad med bar nges pa// nyan thos dang 'ang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'breg pa ste/ ting nge 'dzan des rnam bar sbyar ba'i
byang chub sems dapa' sems dpa' chen penaM/ rgyu'adu bla na med pa yang dag bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// lcas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa'i ng 'byor ting nge 'dzan
'di 'ba' zhig gis/ rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub semaMs dpa' sems dpa' chen o rgyur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya 'a ma/ 'on tam de ltakhu'i
tang nge 'dzan gzhan tshul kyang yod/ 2ba/byardo gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyad pas kyang/ du nug
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshum nyo par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur yang yod de// klas pa// tshe dang ldan pa
'ab 'byer ting nge 'dzan gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' saMms dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa ru 'tshang
rgya ba gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/
ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzo gas par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du na

chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par rtsa ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// zla ba bzang pa zhig bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes/
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod do// chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// spyi gtsug rnam

wa0nya pa' lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzazhi yod de// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga
'dzin yod de// chos thams cad la 'jug ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'ating nge 'dzin yod de// 'od zer rab tu
'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod do// dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yang dra/ par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nges pa'i tshig la
gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzani yod de// tshig bla dgas la yang dag bas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// phyogs rnam pa/ dra ba lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzan yod de// phyag rgya yongs su 'dzan pa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod do// nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// chos thams cad yang dag pa bstanu ba rgya mtsho'i phyag
rgya zhes bya ba'i tange nge 'dzin yod de// nam mkha' rgyas bsdu 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzani yod de// rgyal ma tshan rtse mo'i
dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// dbang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// seng ge rnam brdau0f8bspyi
pa zhes bya ba'i nga nge 'dzan yod de// sbel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan 'od de// nyon mongs pa spangs ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// rnam par snang ba zhes bya/
ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod do// tshol ba med pa zhas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod da// gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
dri ma med pa'i sgen ma zhes bya ba'i tingang 'dzan yod de/ 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzin yod de// 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzani yod de// kun tu snang ba zhes byaba'i
ting nge 'dzin yod de// dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin yod do// dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// glog gi
sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod de// rdud mi shes pa zhes bya ste ting nge 'dzan yod de// ma 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod do// gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
spyi/ yod do// zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzani yod do/ mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod de/ 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya'a'i ting nge 'dzan yod de// nyi ma'i sgen ma

zhes bya ba'i tid de 'dzin yod de// zla ba dri ma med pa zhes phuba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ ( shes rab snyen ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//

ba/ snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod do/
sems gnas pa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// kun tuganang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tang de 'dzin yod do// 'on chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nga
'dzan yod de// chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad mnyams pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// dga' ba speng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/
chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzin yod de// chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// yi ge
mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i tange nge 'dzin yod de// yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tange nge 'dzin yod de// dmigs ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'gyur ba med bzhes

bya ba'i tangange 'dzan yod do// rnam pa med ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// mang nges par 'jugapa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod

do rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// spyod pa dang ldan ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ dgayo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzani yod de// yon tan thams cad kyitshogs su gyun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin yod de// dge ba'i/
me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzin yod de// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i tange nge'adzani yod do// spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzazhi yod de//
mi mnyam ba dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzan yod do// chos thams can las 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yongs su gamed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzani yod do//

tshonam nu'u rnam parda sel ba zhes bya ba'i tang de 'dzin yod de// gnasasu bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// gcig tu rnam pa sra bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod de// rnam pa

phyi mngon pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzani yod de/ rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ rnam pa 'a 'dordo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// srid pa'i gzhithanA

thad rtogs pa'-i khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// sgra dbyangs kyi ye ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dza na yodad//
sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ta nga nge 'dzin yod do/ mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//

rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bdami shis pa'i za ma/
tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzuT kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzazhi yod do// yang dag pa dang leg ba thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// 'gal ba
dang 'gag pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bcu byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od sde ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin yod do// sung pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod do// glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin yod do// rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i tange nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin mnyam ba nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
yod do// rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// nyon mongs pa med pazu gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad
nyon mongs pa mid pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// de bzhin nyid la/
gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i tang 'dzin yod do// lus kyi skyon yang dag pasel bas rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan yod do// drag gi skyon
rnam par 'a jig pas nam mkha' lta bur rgyur zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzan yod do// tsho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gas pa
med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pa ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzo gas par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis
rnam par skyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ rgyur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge
'dzan dang/ gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
'tshangargya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rnal 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tang nge 'dzin de dag gi rnam par spyod pa de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pa de lung bstan te/ des ni ting nge 'dzan kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// bdag ni snyoms par zhugs sa zhes bya bar tang nge 'dzan dus rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do//
bdag ni snyam par 'jug ga/ bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// bdag ni mnyam bar bzhag par gyur to zhes zlom sems su 'gyur ba mad de/ de la rnam par rtog pa de dag mer
cing mi rgyu'o// smras pa/ blo dang ldan pa rab 'bya'i tang nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dwapa' che na pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ 'ab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gazhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gyur
da dung dzin to// tang de 'dzan nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ted pa'i dzan to// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzani
kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dba' yang gzhan l/ ting nge 'dzan kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
phyir/ trid nge 'dzin kyang byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sams dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin lan na/ del ting nge 'dzin bstan bar nus sam/ zub 'byor gyis smras pa tsho dang ldan raya/

bdwa ti'i bu de ni ma yazhe na/ smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor zigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/ 3ba 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du dang bu
byed pa med do// smras pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med pa'i shi go/ sgrus pa/ de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ 'ab 'bya'o
gyis smras pa/ chos thams ca da med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu de tang de bzhi/
sa de la rnam 'du shes par byed pa med do// 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa// ci'i phyi'i rnam par shes par byed ba med cing 'du shes su 'gyur ba medu/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
ting nge 'dzin de yang med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir rnam pa shes pa med de// 'du shes su 'gyur ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes khyabaganang ste/ rab 'byor legs se legs so// tshegakadi ni legs par bshad do// ji ltar dras nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i
nyan sa kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'a de yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ de ltar shes bral kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin bdang/ sbyin pa'i kha rdul tu phyin pa la bslab par
bya'o byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA/
ba dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin yal mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob de// bsam gtan gyi pha la tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha zol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bab la ni dmigA
pa'i tshul gyis slob sde// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' lapadi ltar slob pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis sleb pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa la// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
slob pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du ma dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam pa ga 'i
phyi'i bdag mi dmigs go/ sems can dang/ srog dang 'gro ba dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shod sman dang/ shad bdag dang/ byed pa po dang/ tsho
wa ba bo dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba de ma dmigs sa// shani tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang/ skye mched dang/ khams dung/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ ]shin tu
rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi'i kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mi dmigs so// shani chu rnam porda dag pa'i phyi'i 'dod pa'i khams
mi dmigasas// shani tu rnam par dag ba'i phyi'i gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so// shanitu rnam par dag pa'i bya'i gzugs med ba'i khams ma dmigs se// shin tu
rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so// shani tu rnam pa 'a dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i 'dun pa rnams dang/
bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshud med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ matsan gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jugakha dkudang/
stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes ba rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang se sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni dems
tha @#// sa// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi'i rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs se// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi'i lan cig phyi'i 'ong ba dang/ phyi'i mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa
dang rdung sangs rgyas mi dmigs sa// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs sa// shan tu rnam pa dag pa'i phyir byang chub l migs so// shin tu rnam par
dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ches thams cad ma skyes pa dang/
mi 'gag pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byung ba med pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa dang/ mdon bar 'a du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag
pa zhes bya ste/ shA rwa dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ltar sleb
pa'i byung chub sems dpa' sems du pan chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chug
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos gang la yang slob pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAr dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag ni byas pa sa ser skye bas ji lta ba mden bar chags par
ba[s ]rtsa ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yazhe no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dus 'o nachos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ji/
ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir med ces bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das che'i slad du Achis pa ma lags bag ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong ba nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi bar gyi sar yod pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang/
'du shes dang/ 'du byed drung/ rnam par shes pa rlung sbyong ba nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyi'i yod pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi tshes
rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang/ dnges pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ban gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du nang stod gzhan dang/
dnges pa med pa'i nge win stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyi'i yod ba ma yin no// de la byis pa se se'i skye ba rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas srid ba la mngon par zhen taM/ de dag gis med
pa la es su brtag pas med pa la mngon par zhon tsang/ 'di lta ste/ chad ba dang rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag
yongs su brtags nas ming dang gzugasaa man babazhin pa de dag dranabanya bar gzhag pa rnams la mdon par zhen cing/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
bar la mngon par zhan to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhan pas yod pa ma yin ba'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo/ ci mi shes mi mthong zhi na//
gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa3shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo// skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel pa
'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shesaoM mthogo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mashes mi mthong ngo// de ltar de dgazhi byas
pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'deng pa ste// de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas 'byung ba ma yan zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba
ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos dang 'ad sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin na/ de dag ni yid mi ches ba ste/ ji ltar yod mi chos she na/
gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes byakhar yid mi ches so// byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba yod mi chos so// de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yan
zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ byi' mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma
yani no// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yan zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/
rnam pa shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la mngon par zhen ba yan/ skye mched dang khams
dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon pa razhen pa ya 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ ga ti nug la mngon par zhen pa yani/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la chungono ba ra zhen
ba yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yan te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhas bya'o// gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob chung/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta grub pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi sleb pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yan no// gsel pa
bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' de shes 'bu kyi kha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'aras
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa thabs mi mkhas pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shadi mngon par zhen/ bsamakan
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha bul tu bya ba nan/ brjod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shang
mngon par zhen/ stong pa 'di thams cad dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par sbyong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs
blo rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'thags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan
rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar ba brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms parda 'jug pa dgu dang/
[po/ ]stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang mngon ba ba shes pa rnams dang/ tang nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
stobs bcu dang/ mi 'phrogs pa bzhi dang/ sa sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chon pa dang/ snying rje chen pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags
shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi brda la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
ni shes rtab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa in/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du me 'byung ba la no// gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyu3 ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba logs//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi lo rel tu phyin par
mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzed bte pha la tuphu'i pa/
dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tsa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
shes rus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nya[”] du 'byung ngo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pa de lta shes rab kyi pha rdol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ de lta'abras bab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
de gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong po/
nyed mdamags pa'i tshul dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba shes par bya'o//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug go////de nas tshe dang ldan pa zab 'khyer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga sel to// bcom
ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'ad shas zab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur rom/
rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyani theb par 'gyu ra 'tsho zhes mchi na/ bcos ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan bar bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha
bol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs
shang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyin du 'byung bar 'gyu'u 'am/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'disangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyadi du 'byung bar 'gyub bam/
rnam pa thamaMs cad mkhyen pa nyani theb bar 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan parda bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ 'a'abyor
delta bas na/ de khyed nyid la dris/ khyed nyid kyis ji ltab bzed pa de ltar lung ston cig/ rdab 'byor de ji snyam du sems gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang
gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam gsel pa/ bcom
ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da ji snyam dusams/ mig kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba dang/
sna dang lce dang/ lus dang (yid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyum yong gzhan zhig yin sAm mam/ sgranang/
sbyo[°]dri dang/ ro dang/ de gdang/ chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi rnam pa shes pa yang gzhan laM/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i
rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam parda shos pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
zhig yin snyam lam/ mig gi 'dus te rtag pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus tardog pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te/
zag pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te theg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan/
la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te sreg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ spyi'i 'dus te rdog pa'i rkyen gyis tshon ba
dang/ lus kyi 'dus te rdog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsal po//
bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma
yang gzhan zhig yin snyam nam/ gsal pa/ bcos ldan 'das da lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ [·]ba 'byord ji snyam du sems sadzes
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi brda yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yAn sUm mas/ gsal pa bcom ldan 'das da lta ma lags so// ba co ma ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam du bams bung tshul kyang gzhan la/ sgyu la yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsal ba/ bces ldan 'das da lta ma lags so//
bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan m lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang smyu ma/ sgyu ma nyad kyang gzugs sa// bcom ldan/
'das tsotsA ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan gyi lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags M te rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ glu mnyid
kyang rnam parta shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kya da gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags mig 'di kyan sgyu mA/ sgyu ma rnye[– ]lkog ge/ btsem ldan 'das rno ba dang/
sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyang gzhan malags/ sgyu ma yang gazhan ma lags te/ de nyid kyang smyu ma/ sgyu mo nyid kyang yod do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang
gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma 'di kyang gzugs sa/ btsem ldan 'das sku dang/ dri dang/ re dang/ reg dang/
[b]tshes kyang gzhan ma lags M/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyini kyang sgyu ma/ skya na nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das mgi gi rnam parwa shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/
sgyum yang gazhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sbya mo nyid kyang mig mi rnam pa3shes pa'i// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/
sa sna'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam parla shas pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes ba yang gzhan la lags skya ma yang gzhan ma lags te//
yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yod kyi rnam pasAshes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te rdeg ba yang gzhan ma lags M/ rgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
te/ mig gi 'dus te rteg pa nyid kyang skya mo/ sgyu ma 'dikyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce 'i ltadus
te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te rtag pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang skya ma/
sgra ma nyid kyang yade kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho ba yang gozhan ma lags ]sbya ma yang gzhan la lags te/ mig gi 'dus
rig pa'i skyon gyis tshor nyid kyang sgyu ma/ skya ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus ta 'og pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// btsem ldan 'das rna ba'i 'odus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang [Y]lce'i 'dus te rdog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te sreg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ yad kyi 'dus te sdog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba lang ba gzhan ma lags/ rgya ma yang gzhan ma lags te// yid kyis dus ta3ga ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyade kyang sku na/ skya ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te sdog pa'i rkyen kyis
tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogasaM kyi chos rnams kyi brda yang gzhan ma lags/ sgra ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang rgyal/ sgyu ma nyi
kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams su// bcom ldan 'adus sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan malags taM/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te//
byang chub nyid kyang skya mo/ sgra ma nyid kyang byang chub bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skya mal skye ba 'am 'gag ba yod dam/ gsel pa/
bcom ldan 'das da ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byon de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongasaM pa 'am rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsal nga
btsem ldan 'das da na ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'ab 'byor de dza snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pamed
cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byang bar 'gyur ras/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nya'i thob
'gyur ram/ gsel pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byin de ji snyam du sems/ lta ba len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la/
'di lta ste// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba' 'du shes pa dang/ brda dang/ gdags ba dang/ tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor du ji snyam dusums/ 'du shes dang/ brda dang/ gdags ba dang/ tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga pa skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa
'am kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam pa byung bar dmigs pa 'gyur ram/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de na mi 'gyuru 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
rab 'bya'i da ji snyam du sems/ gung la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang/ gdags pa med pa dang/ tha snyad med pa dang/ ming med pa dang/ ming du gdags pa med pa dang//
lus med pa dang/ lus kyi las med pa dang/ ngag med pa dang/ ngag gi las med pa dang yid med pa dang/ yid kyi las med pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa
dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med dang/ rnam ba 'a byang ba med ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
bam[？ ] rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur bam/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bye'o de ltar byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la bslabs shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo// rna ma pa thams cad/
mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyupa so// gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rtol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyuma'i
skyes bus bslab pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhu na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga de de'adi sgyu ma'i
skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byed de rje snyam dusams/ phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la bslabs shing/
rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams
[ni dngos pa ma mchis ba'i rang bzhin te/ ranges pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'ab 'bye'o de ji snyam du sems//
rmi lam lta bu'i phung pelnga po de dag shes zab kyi pha zel tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur 'am/ gsel la/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi
'gyur/ da ci'i slad du zhi na/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di lta'i rma lam ni dnges pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ta/dngos pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// zab 'phyo'o de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma lta bu dang/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang/ mig yor lta bu dang/ chu zla lta bu dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/
sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rtab kyi pha rdel tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das da ni mi
'ogrub no// de ci'i slad du zha na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar skya ma ni dngos pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgrakhacha nani dnges pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yo ni dngos pas
mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu bla na dngos bo ma mchis pa'i nang bzhin/ smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa ni dngos pe ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos pen nache
/pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bum 'bye'u de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu
'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam pa bu shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ da ni bung ba lnga'o// bab 'phye'i gzugs
ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes ba ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin ba de ni dbang pa drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// 'ab
'bya'o gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba drang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byen dang/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra ban+tan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang lan pa de ni dbang pa drug ge/
pa ni phung po lnga'o// rngab 'bye'o gzugs ni mig yor lta bu/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu su/ rnam par shes pa gang yin ba de ni
dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// 'ab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang
yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ den bung pa lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/
rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni bung po lnga'o// rab 'byab gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang [） ] rnam par shes pa ni sprul
ba lta bu ste/ rnam parba shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs sa// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ni stong pa nyid kyi
bcu gyi phyin mi dmigs so// gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thes na/
mi 'jigs mi sprang bo dang/ skrag bar mi 'gyur ba lags zang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bya'o gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pa thag pa la gsar du
zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongasan/ 'jigs shang sdang ba dang//
sgrag pa ba yang 'gyur ro// gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang mi sgug pa'i shis rdub kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shis zab kyi pha rol tu phyi pa
la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams can mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba la rteg ste/ de ma dmigs se// tsho3 ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'dubyed
dang rnam par shes pa mi rta gces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
mkhas pa'i// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigasas// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed dud rnam pa' shes ba sdug bsngal zhes bya brda rtog ste/ de
ma dmigs se// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de ma dmigs so// tshe ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed
dang/ rnam pa shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ da 'i dmigs go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi'u dang ldan ba'i sems kyis gzugs zhe zhes bya bar rtog ste/ dmi dmigs
so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de ma dmigasago/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi gzug
steng zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs se// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang// 'du byed dang/ rnam pa3 shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs se// rnam bathams cad mkhyen
ba nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mtshan mamed ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmags so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces
bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyadi dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tsho ba dang/ 'du shes
dang 'du byed dang/ rnam pa3 shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste da mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mngon pa 'du
bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de ma dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/deme dmigasas//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ da mi dmigs se// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes ba dban
zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs sa// rtab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 2ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan+ti thabs mkhas pa'o
'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ba 'ol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i de la bya
