bas gzugs ki rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lda' ba' yid la bya bas/ tshod bar ng/ 'du shes dang 'du byed dang/
rnam par she sa ba mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'a byed de/ du mi dmigs sa// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'di la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog pa
byed de/ de ni dmigs so// tshob pa dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa stag bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog pa byed de de mi dmigs se// rnam pa thams cad
@# mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yade la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam brda rtog padra byed de/ da mi dmigs sa// tshor b.rung/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam
pa sna shas ba bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i lade la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rna ma bar rtog par
byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor bdang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de ma dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs steng ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam ba2 shes pa stong pa'i
rnam bza rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yad la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam bar rtog bar byed de/ de mi dmigs sa//
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam bar shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa= rtog bra' byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyidi dang ldan pa'i lad lo bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang//
rnam ba'u shis pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya
ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam bar shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ba'i rnam par rtog par byed
de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyade dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtog pa phyed de/ de ma dmigs so// tshor ba dang/
'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam pa du rtog pa 'u byed de/ de mi dmigs se/ kha 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'bya'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de ltar rtog ba de 'di snyam du sems
te sems can thams cadra la gzugs mi rtag ces bya brda de mi dmigs ba'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes pa mi
rtag ces bya bar midamig pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong ba dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang//
sman pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med ba dang/ dben zhes bya brda de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/
rnam brda shes ba sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong ba dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/
dban zhes bya babade ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyani ba'i tha b+hol tu phyin pa ste// de yod pas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba ma 'jigs mi sngang skrag par ma 'ugyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan bas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa rda ladi la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'di la byed de//
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa lnga yadi la byed
ba de mi dmigs ba'i tshul gyis yid la byed da// nyan thos dang 'ang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/
zhi ba dang/ steng ba dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ sen ba med pa dang 1 mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam sras yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis yid la byed do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa drags pa gang sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong ba dang/ mtshan ma
med pa dang/ smon pa mer ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba mad pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam pa na yid la byed pa de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// 3ba 'byor 'di ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha 'ol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ma
za 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos rje dag la mi rtag pa'i
rnam ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med
pa'i rnam pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa dang/ bzed pa dang/ mes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po' bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen pa ma 'jigs mi sngang skug par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byon gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba'u de ma dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog ge/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya brda de mi dmigs pa'i tshu la gyis/ ba tshu rtog go/
ma gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang [）]steng zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ sen ba med rtsas bya ba dang/ mngon
bar 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnal pad+ma shes pa sdug
bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang// mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba
med zas bya ba dang/ dbon zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog ge/ de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyade dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ mi gtong
zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ da yod bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bod mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'grub 'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya brda de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba dang/
mi dge ba'i ches de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgags su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go skabs mi 'byed pa dang/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces
zla bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ sman pa medra ces bya ba dang/ mongon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya
ba' de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing/ nyan thos dang 'ang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang/ mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go skabs
mi 'byed pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/
zhi zhes bya ba dang/ steng zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ mngon par 'du byo ba med ces bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis rtag cing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang/ mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyu ru ba gzhan gyi go skabs mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rel tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems che na pa ma 'jigs mi sngang sku ga pa mi
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po bcu gnyis ba// 'ab 'bya'o gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pe shas 'ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lda na pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa thams cad rab tu rtog ste/
gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong ba ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang// 'du byed dang/
rnam pa tha shes pa'i steng pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam parna shes pa nyid kyang steng pa nyid do// stengal nyan kyang rnam bar shes pa'o/ dmag gi steng pa nyid kyis
mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mag nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang mig ge/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi stong ba nyid kyis yid steng bam yin gyi/
yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang yid de// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang steng pa nyid de// steng pa nyade kyang
gzugs so// sgra dang/ dwa dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis ches steng pa sa ya zhi kyi/ tshes nyad kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos s//
mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ste ngo ba nad kyis mig gi rnam par shes steng ba ma yan gyi/ mag gi rnam pa3 shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// steng pa nyid kyang mig/
gi rnam par shes pa'i// rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam pa2shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam pa3 shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam pa tsa shes pa dang/ mde kyi rnam pa shes
pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// steng pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te
sdug pa'i steng pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te theg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i// rna ba'i 'dus te
kyi rig pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus rtag pa'i steng pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te drug pa stong pa
na yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te nyeg ba nyid kyang steng ba nyadi de// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te sog ba'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i steng pa nyid kyis sogagi 'dus te
theg pa'i rkyen gyis nor ba stong ba ma yin gyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa 'di dag steng pa'i khyad mgo gi 'dus te zag pa'i skye na gyis tshor ba'i/ na pa 'a
tha 'dus te nyeg pa'i rkyen gyis tshobu ba dang/ sna'i 'dus rdeg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te rtag pa'i rkyen gyis tshon ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te ga pa'i rkyen gyis tshe
ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i steng ba nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te rdog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stengo ba na yan gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te zag ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid

kyang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te theg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nya ba' gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye brda gzhag pa steng pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa
ba gzhag pa nyid kyang steng pa nyid da// steng pa nyid kyang dran pa nye brda gzhag pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi steng pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa stong pa
ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid de// steng pa nyud kyang sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa'i// 'ab 'bya'o 'di ni byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa
zin pa'o shes rtab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ zab 'khyer 'di ni byang chung se mas dpa' sams dpa' chen bzhis rbab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i// thabs mkhas/
pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sdang skyag par mi 'gyur re// rab 'byed kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das
dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sta na ba 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sngang
skug par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 3ba 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes/
gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stan cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ma gtogs par//
nyan thes kyis 'am nang sangs rgyas kyi san+ta yongs su sdeb mi 'jug pa'o// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am 'ang sangs rgyus kyi sa dra yas su sre'i mi 'jug pa ste
ba 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sdig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar di mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/
wa4 rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs ba'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang/ tshordab dang//
'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes ba bdag med ces bya ba de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshulakyis chos stano/
ba dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shos dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes pa zhi zhes bya brda de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
/tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ tshor ba dang// 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'i de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ kublugs mtshan
ma med ces bya bar do mdamags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ tshorda ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa mtshan mamed ces bya bar da mi dmags pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya khab de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa smon
ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ gzugs mngon par 'du byas med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshes ston pa dang tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chostson pa dang/ gzugs dban zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis chos ston pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi[“]tshoston tsang/ dpe na pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sa' yongs su sngar 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pa'i dag ba'i bshes gnyen du rig la bya'o// rob 'khyol gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyin ni/ gang de la mig mi rtag ces
bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid mi rtag ces bya ba du ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ba dang/
mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ba dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs ba'i
tshul gyis chos ston ba dang/ mgabadag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yade bdag med ces bya bar do/
bsab mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ba dang tshig zhi zhes ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ rnakha dang/ sna dang lce dang/ lus dang/ da ni zhes
bya bar de la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang/ mig steng zhes bya ba de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ba dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/
yid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ mag mtshan ma chad ces bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ba dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/
lus dang/ pad mtshan la tshad ces bya ba la re mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ man sman pa med ces bya ba de la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshes nyen ba dang/ rna ba dang/
sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid smon pa med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ mig mno ba'i 'du bya ba yod ces bya ba'i de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos ste na ba dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba 'a de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ mig dban zhes
khyakhar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ rna bo dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dban zhes bya ba de mi makas pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang/ dag
dba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ma gtogs gan nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdes mi 'jug pa'o//
rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pe'i dge ba'i bshes gnyan ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston tsang//
dge ba'i rtsa ba cams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa// nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa na yongs su sngardo mi 'jug pa dang/ sladang/ dri dang/
dang/ reg dang/ chos mi rtag ces bya ba'i de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brams cad kyang rnam ba thams can mkhyen pa nyidi ma gtogs bar/ nyan
thos kyis rnam rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa dang/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshes sten pa dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang//
re dang/ sreg dang/ chos sdug bsngal shes bya bas de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so ston ba dang/ gzugs bdag med ces bya brda de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ba dang/
sgra dang/ dri dang/ 'o dang/ rdeg dang/ chos bdag med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ba dang/ gzugs ni zhes bya ba de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sa ston

stan pa dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ dang/ reg dang/ chos stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sen ba dang/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar dag dmigs pa'i tshul

'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas to/ sdig pa'i grags pa 'i sug par lhung zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa ba ka' stsal pa/

zab kyipa zol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha srol tu phyin pa bsgom nang dmigs taM/ bsam
gtan gyi brdol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang/ brtson 'grusakyi pha de la tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rmem sems su byed/

par gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya ba'i yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i
ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi brda zhes bya brda yid la byed/ tsho ba dang/ 'dungashas dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya ba yid lubyed/ rnam pa shes
pa phyi stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang steng pa zhes bya bar yade la byed/ rnam bcu shes pa dngos po med ba'i re ba 'di steng pa 'di kyi bar zhes bya bar yar la

dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa ni ngo bo de steng pa nyid kyi ban de yang dmigs la/ steng pa nyid de dag kyang rlom sems/
shu su byed do// mig gi rnam pa' shas pa nang stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed/ mig gi rnam pa3 shes pa pha steng pa zhes bya brda yid la byed/ mig gi rnam nga ba nas pa phyi nang stong pa
zhes bya ba' yid la byed/ mig gi rnam pa shes pa dngos po med pa'i nge ba 'di stong pa nyid kyi ba ba zhes bya brda yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam pa 'a shas pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes
pa/ pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam pa3shas pa dang/ srid kyi rnam par shes pa nang steng pa zhes bya ba yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam pa shes pa phyi steng pa zhes
bar yid la byed pa de kyi rnam pa shes pa phyi nang steng nga zhes bya ba Na yid la byed yid kyi rnam paru shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo lo 'di stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba ra yod la
sgyu byed cing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid du yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du yang dmigs/ dnges pa med pa'i ngo bo/
stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa 'di de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gi 'dus te rdeg pa nang steng ba zhes bya ba'i yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te
[6/ ]theg pa phyi steng pa zhes bya brnga yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus ta zeg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bab pa red la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngas pa med pa'i ngo bo de stong pa nyid kyi bza
zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus pa rtag pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus
theg pa nang steng pa zhes bya ba yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phye steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang steng pa zhes ba ba yid la byed/
yid kyi 'dus te theg pa dnges pa med pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ba' zhes bya bar ya de la byed cing/ dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis nang steng pa nyid du yang dran gas/ phyi steng ba nyade
de yang dmigs/ phyi nang steng pa 'di de yang dmigs/ dranges pa med pa'i nge ba 'di stong pa 'di kyibatra de yang dmags lta/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sa mas su byed de//
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bas yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi steng pa zhes bya ba zu yade la byed/ mig gi 'dus te
theg pa'i rkyen gyis tshorda ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya brnga yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho ba dngos po med pa'i nga ba nyani stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba ba byed//
rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lci'i 'dus te theg pa'i rkyen gyis tshodra ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te

sreg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang yid kyi 'dus te theg pa'i rkyen gyis tshob ba nang stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshorda ba phyi steng ba zhes bya ba yid la khyod/

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya ba'u yid la byed yid kyi 'dus pa rjeg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dnges pa med pa ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi brda zhes bya ba bu yar la
byed thang/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmags/ phyi stong pa 'di de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos pa med pa'i nge ba 'di steng nga/
'di kyi brda de yang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed de// sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya brda yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes byayar yidi 'byed/

spyi sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya brda yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i nge ba 'di stong pa nyid kyi badra zhes bya ba yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang/ mo'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams

dang = nam mkha'i khams dang/ rnam pasngashes pa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed/ rnam pa shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bas led la khyim

rnam bzangashes pa'i khams dnges pa med pa'i dri ba nyadi stong pa nyid kyi bsdu zhes bya brnga yid la byed/ ma zig pa nang steng pa zhes bya brda yade la byed/ ma zig nga phye steng pa zhes bya bcu yod/
byed ma zig pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bas yid la byed/ ma rig pa dnges pa med pa'i ngo bo 'de steng pa nyid kyi ba zhes bya ba yid la byed/ 'du byed dang/ rnamam3 shes ba dang/
ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ rig pa dang/ tshobrab dang/ sred pa dang/ len pa dang/ srid pa dang/ skye ba dang/ rga shi nang steng pa zhes bya ba yid la byed//

rga shi phyi steng pa zhes bya brnga yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya badra yang 'byed/ rga shi dngos po mar pa'i ngo bo nyi'i steng pa nyid kyi brda zhes bya bcu yid la byed rung/ dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis nang stong ba nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi steng pa nyid de yang dmigs// phyi nang steng pa de de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyade kyi bab ni ya nga
dmigs la/ stong pa nyidi de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed de// 'ab 'byarnga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen pe shas 'ab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa spyod
pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'de dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dran pa nye brda gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ ra maM gas pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye brda gzhag
ba de dag kyang dmags la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed de// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams
dang dbang pa rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag zlums dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden ba rnams dang/
bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam bar thar ba brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug
ba dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon pa/shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi ske rnams dang/ de bzhacha gsheg
pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ sa sa yang dag par rlig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste/ dmigs ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos
'jug bde dag kyang dmigasal/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba de dag gis kyang ma sems su byed de// 'ab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' n po shis rab kyi pha'ol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni shes 3ba kyi pha rjel tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang la skrag bar 'gyur/ gsel pa/ bamaldan 'das
sa dziltar na byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pa sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cang/ shes rab kyis la tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sngang la skrag par gyur zhing/
sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug bcu lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs bo ni shesa'ab
kyi sa srol tu phyin pa la spyod bzos pa med ga' byed cing/ zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha la tu phyin b dang/
tshul khrims kyi ya la tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med bar byed cing/ zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/'di'i tshes ma yin/
'di ni 'dul ba ma ne gyis/ 'du labaslab pahwa mi bya'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bza' byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan bar mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// bkrugapar mi bya'o//
kun chub par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi go/ 'di dag ni gzhan dag la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zerwa ba 'di'i/ 'ab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grags
pos rig par bya'o// rab 'bya'o gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs pa ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa
dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog 'ang mas pa med par byed de/ zigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rdul tu phyin
pa bsgoms pas khyod laci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyed la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyed la ci zhig bya/ bzed pa'i thalo tu

phyin pa bsgoms pas khyed la ci zhig bya// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i brjel tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyed la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong nge zhes bdud kyi
las mi sna mi sten/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di'i/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to
can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shang/ byang chub sems dang cu sems dpasnyan pa'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mad dang/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang/ lung bstan pa
spyi dang tshags su bcad pa dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ gleng gzhi dang/ 'di ltar 'das pa dang/ skyes ba'i 'bas dang/ shin tu rgyas pa dang/ chos rmad du byung ba dang/ rtogs pa
brjed pa dang/ gtan la bab pa bstan pa dag stan to/ 'grel te// rnam par 'byed do// gsalakha byed de// yongs su ston to zhes 'dud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las

jug mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs pe'i dag pa 'o/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par 'ge pa bya'o// byab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi
cha byad du byas shang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du zigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang srung byed kyang mad/ khyed ni phyi'i mi ldeg pa yang
yin/ khyedakyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya batra yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'dri lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi sten pa ni//
zab 'bya'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogaper 'gi par bya'o// rab 'byobu gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du zegs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo// rnapa dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ni bdag
gam bdag gis stod nga// gzugs ni bdag ma dag gis stong nga// sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo// mig gi rnam pa3 shes
pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo// rna ba'i rnam pa3 shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam pa
shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te de ga ba dang/
lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te theg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo// mig gi 'dus te theg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam dgags
stong ngo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho ba dang/ lce'i 'dus tu sdug pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

ba dang Da yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du ni bdag gam bdag bdagags steng ngo// tshul khrims kyi phag tu byin pa dang/
bzod pa'i la phul tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang/ shes zab kyi la sol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo// byang chub
kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi sgra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogA
tsaka pe zig bar 'o// rdab 'byab gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag zang sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shinge/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i drung du phyin te/
'di skad du rigs kyi bu sharnga phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shos bya ba yang med do//
byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos shas bya ba yang med de// lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shapA lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/
rog dang/ steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shas bya ba yang med do//
byung chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos shes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag ma spyi mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
sdig pa'i gegs pa'i ga par bya'o// bab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi na khyad du byas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du
phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing/ nyan thos dang 'brasangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems pa dang/ rjes su ston padilta
bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i 'gi par bya'o// sdab 'bya' gzhan
lang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po 'am slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shaji/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pe'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yide la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran pa nye ba'agazhag pa rnams la sbyar ba dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa
rnams dang/ drab ng po rnams dang/ stabs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang/ stong pa de dang do mtshan ma med pa dang/
! smon pa med pa'i brda gyi ngos rnams la sbyor zhing/ de ltar cigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su sgoms la/ na thos kyi sa mngon du gyis shig/ bla na med kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi sa mi sten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs pod cig par yo/
rab 'byobagazhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i drung du phyin te/ 'dik+kad du med

wal wa/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas ngas khyed la ci zhage bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med parnga 'khor ba na 'khor nang rkang lag dang mgo/
gcad pa tshad med bas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya yod ba dang/ lan cig phyi'i 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon duphyar yod pa dang/
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byas yod pa dang/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byad yod pa de labartson pa gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di'i/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dgo slong gi cha byad du byas shing/ byang
rgyu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/
zhi ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ tshor ba dang/
'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston ba dang/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/
steng bdang/ mtshan ma med ba dad/ smon ba med ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dbenazhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sten pa dang mig
ma rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal bo dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ steng pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/
dben nas bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/
zhi ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon ba med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dban zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston ba dang/ gzugasairtag
casabya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med ba dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ marngon pa'i 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dban
rgyunas bya ba dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ 'o dang/ rig dang/ chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/
stong ba dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med ba dang/ dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ mgi ki rnam par shesapa
wakan mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhib dang/ stongal dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ sman pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ rgyu
dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam bcu shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam pa gas pa dang/
yidakyi rnam ban shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/
mdzen par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtagaces bya ba dang// sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/
zhi ba dang/ steng pa dang/ mtshan mamed pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dben zhes bya bshu dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sten pa dang/ rna ba'i
'dus tag pa dang/ sna'i 'dus ta zug pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus tetheg pa mi rtag theg bya ba dang/ stag
bsngal ba dang/ bdog med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon paMrda 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dbenazhas bya bar dmigos
ba'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te theg ba'i rkyen gyis tsho ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong pa
za dang/ mtshan ma med ba dang/ smon pa medu ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston ba dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lca'i dus te zug pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te rngog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med bdang/
mno par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/
bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong ba dang/ mtshan ma med ba dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du byab med ba dang/ dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa
dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhe ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa
med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dngamigs ba'i tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam ba de dag mi bla ma ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'

'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdug gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gag bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams
cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskong par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad thog pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams cad
yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang/ sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mad pa/sa chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par
bya'o bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sprad par bya'o// bdag gse chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba
phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis tshes kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par/
bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'dan byang chub sems dang 'asams dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rdzolta bu ste/ dad la gnas shing byang chub samos
dpa' sems dang 'a chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmags pa'i tshul rgyas byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po 'di
ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song ga sa gnas pa dang/ gshAn rdzi' 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed nug sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur
ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de laphyongachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
gong du sims 'di ltar b skyod par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stangomang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan
las 'das pa'i de rus su yongs su ma ngan pas ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes/ thabs
de lta bu s sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bsgrubs/
kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o// de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'artsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khAg
[$ brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bu'o snyam du sems basnyad par bya sta/
rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po/
nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams
cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po chan/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags
kyi sems ma skyid/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyid/ gti mug gsems ma skyed/ gtso ba'i sems ma skyod/ nyan thos kyi sams dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang ma skyed pa ste/
'di no bya chub sems dpa' sems dapa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o// des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang/ sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o// rab
'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen ngos ma sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya/ de la byang chub sems dpagasams dpa' chen pa'i sems ma skyal ba na/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yod la byed cing/ des rlom sems su ma byed pa sa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po' sems ma sgul ba'o//soms
rjes sems can thams cad kyi phul du ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// rab 'abyor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde
ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sams dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems na sems can thams cad skyobacing/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi
gtongal des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa sa/ rab 'byora'ad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang lan po'o wen pa dang bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shadesems can
gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dapa' mas dang ba chen pos rtag tu rgyun ma'achad par chos
'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar 'gyur ro// chos la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos
thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pagang zhe na/ gang de la chos 'dod cingamos pa lta/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba
gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ste/ 'dan chos la dga' b zhes bya'o// de la tshes la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang myos de la yon tan du lta ba sta2 'ad no tshos
la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'dane tshes la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/
rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' yams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyo pas/ nang stong pa nyare la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la
gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te// sems can gyi phung po chen po sa pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpaka chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bas/
gtan rnams dang tshad mad pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/
de bzhin gshogs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rag pa rnams dang/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chagasapa med pas rnam par grol zhing shes pamed pa'i
ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po ngas pa'i phul du ma dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas gang byang chub sems
dnga' sems dang 'cham po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phungapo chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pa/sa de'i phyir byang chub sems dapa'
za sams dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gsud du/
sgyu byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di bdag spyang lcebs pa skya'o/ karom ldan 'das kyis ba 24 la pa// bar dwa ti'i bu de A ljobs pa skyed cag/ shA ro
da dus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang/ sems sun du bo dang/ srog tu lta ba dang/ gang zag tu lta ba dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ shed can
dang shed bdag dang/ byed pa po dang/ tshor ba po dang mdzakong a por lta ba dang/ rtsod par lta ba dang/ rtag par lta ba dang yod par lta ba dang/ med
par lta ba dang/ phung por lta ba dang/ khams su lta ba dang/ skye mched nga lnga pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang/ pha rol tu phan pa dang 2 byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos su lta ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang/ soms can yongs su / ga par bya bar lta pa dang/ songs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang/ byang chub tu lta
ba dang sangs rgyas su lta ba dang/ chos su lta ba dang/ dge 'dun du lta ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du
sems can rnams la chos ston pa brgyade kyang de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'aslad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o//
dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tsa'o phur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
gzugs su ltar 'gyur da yan/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang [7 ] rnam par shes par blta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yi/
sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sa[&]sa dang nya de/mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod tsang/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmages shang//
dmagis pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyod do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sku mched dang/
khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lci ba skyed do// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa rnams dang/ yang dag par sbyong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams dang/ 'phags pa 'olam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa3 bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i/
tshe snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul rgyus lta skyed do// rnam par shar pa dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong nga[”]de dang
mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ taM nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ ma'adzags pa dang/
so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dramags shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyong do//yongs su
mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du dmigs shing dmags pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta
bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed nga ya/ rnam par shis par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/de la
nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rob tu phunang la sprod pa'i tsha/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang pa'i phyir/ ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
dunas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gangahaslad du/ byang chub sams dpa'
sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la pa dag kyang spobs pa skya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ rab 'byor khyed kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ rab 'byor gyi'i gsol ba/
bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi samasam mnyam pa dang mnyam ngo 3sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chagasar
ma mchis sa/ de'i slod du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ de tsa'islad du zhe na/ 'doltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de no zag pa mams
shang khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa sta/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang rang bzhin
stong pa nyid kyi smad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'aslad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/
de tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad thos sas so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'bur gyis sas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las
dpa' chen po'i sems dang ngo/ pasprad phyin chad chos gang yang skya bar yang dag par rjes su ma mtho/ 'badakaM dang/ 'thal ba dang 'grub pa dang/ 'ong ba dang/ 'gro ba dang
kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong sta[7 ]tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa pa'i bu gang la su ya medatsang 'gag pa med pa dang 'phel ba med
tsange 'grib pa med pa dang 'ong ba med cing glo ba med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byung pa mad pa de lanye na thos kyi sems mad do// rang sangs rgyas
kyi sems med do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sims mad de// tshe dang ldan pa gar dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chonapo'i sems ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yaMn nga'i sems so// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan po rab
'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa// khongs su chud pa med pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa mad do zhes sa pa na de ltar/
yan te/ tshe dang ldan pa la 'byor de phas na gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yang chags par 'gyur ba med do// rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidakyi bar yang chags pa mad do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa mad do// tshor bar ng/ 'dushes dang
'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med de// skye mched dang/ khamasadang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byang ba yang chags pa mad do da/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi
bar yang chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do// lcas pa/ tshe
ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// zhes snyas pa na de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'abyor der yang ma zad de/ byas pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa de phyi zagang mod tshang khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
rnams kyi sems dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa yod do// rab 'byor
gyis smasapa/ de lta yin te ]tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu bus pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa de kyi phyor zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa mad do//
nyan thos dang rangasas rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang gzhan stong pa nyid kyi phyir zlog pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhi
stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med tsang khongs su tshud pa med do 2 sbas pa// tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin n 2 gzugs kyang 'ad bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir brag pa mad cing
khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba drung/ 'ang zhes dang 'du byed dang rnam pa/ ra shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir brag pa yod rung khongs su chud pa mad do//
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa mod cung khongs su chud pa medra de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa mad do// rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshodang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu ji skad du sbas pa de bzhanito 2 gzugs kyang rang
[4 ]bzhan stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba dang 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa
mad cing khongs su chud pa mad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phar zag pa mad tsang khongs su chud pa mad do// rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyare kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med tsang khongs su chud pa med do/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du sems
med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa de na de ltar yin to/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags
pa mad do// tshor ba med pa dang/ 'dushes med pa dang 'du byed med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa mad pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs/
kyisos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

pa rnams la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gas pa med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ded bzhin no//
gzugs dang du yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ tshor ba med pa dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/ 'du byed med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa
zayang rnam pa3shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la rags pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma/
('dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang sangs rgyas kyichos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/
de la chags pa med do [”]/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' n po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa na/byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa'i rims/nyan thos dung rang sangs rgyas shums rung dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlomasams su 'gyur ba med/
mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa zhes bya'o/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bortsom
pa ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// chen pa zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs
du pa skya'o// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang bo khyod kyis spobs pa skyedatsag kang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na ga tshan po bgos pa'i sems can lags/
bcom ldan 'das da na thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de na theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces sas so// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa rdzatshom
gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rAdA ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhag gi don du snyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ga nas[q] snyan dngos su katong ba ma yanargyu/ sems can thams cad kyi don du snyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
sdod cing/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo// sems can nyung zad lta' phur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyo/ sems can thams cad
kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ tshul khrims srung ngo/ sems can nyung zad nyo tsha'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnas shang/ bzod pa sgom
pa ma yon gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sod cung/ bzod pa sgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tsha'i/
phyir brtson 'grus kyi Sha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shAng/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yan gyi/ sems can thamasacad kyi don du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod chung/
brtson 'grus rtsom mi// sems ran nyu[E/]h+phad nyo tsho'i phur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ bsam gtan skyid pa ma yin gyisoms can thams cad kyi don
du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod cung/ bsam gtan skyod do// sems can nyung zad nyo tsho'i phyor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shang/ shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/
/ sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo sdod cing/ shes rab sgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chin pa na sems can 'di nyid nuge na phung po ma
lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'dasud cige ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mtha'o zhi 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang
chu btu dgod par bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di sod tsag ni byang chub tu god par mi bya'o zhes soms can yongs su dpag pas go cham gyon gyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to// de 'disnyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i tha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//sems can
thams cad kyang sdon pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar/
bya'o bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ 'phegs pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnamaso dang/
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar
pa brgyud dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting
de 'an rnams dang/ gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rag pa zhi deng 1 byams pa chen
po dang/ sAng rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ 3sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad
[= ]la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/
pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po bcu bzhi pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itsho/ sbon pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/yod la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam
ba thams cad mkhyen pa de dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtongaste/ dag pa'i rtsa ba de yang sam skur thams cad dang thunamong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu yongs su spo ste/ 'dra ni phyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ sbon pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa'i go cha'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas spyin pa yongs su gtong zhing

labya bas/ chos de dag bzod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod tsang/ sbyin pa yongasas
gtong ba'i bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa' chen po sbyin pa yongos su gtong ba'i tshe rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa' yod la bu bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par ma byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi wa rol tu phyin pa

dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi ge mo 'byed pa 'ad ni/ byang chub sems da nga 'a sems dang 'a chen ye shes rab kyi

tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwati'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sprod pan/
pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpasems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod tsang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa' yod la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pany+tsams cad mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa shA yod la bya ba//

'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yod+ma su gtong zhing/ dgaba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba
'di na/ byang chub sems dapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yAn gyi/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thums cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin padalo spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi le rol tu phyin pa'o//
tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'obu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang/
ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin rgyu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'o yodi la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rtan tu dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can
zlo thams cad dang thun mong du byas shang/ blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i theng chub tu yongs sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyayarol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i bezod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tsha dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyongacing ka 3na thos dang
rang sas rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la rgya bas ma yin rgyu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yo de la skyabs/ brtson 'grus nyams par ma byed tsonge/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems
can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su spo ba'adzano 1 byang chub zems dpa' sems dpa' nyenapo shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la

spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhano byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasdod cing 2nyan thos dang rang
[41 ]sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bas ma yin rgyo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing/ dge ba'i rtse ba de yang sems can/
thams cad dang thunamong du byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub tu yongs su slob 'dono/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rngab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa baspyod
pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sgomasadapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing Da chos thams
cad skyomar byas padape'angugs lasara gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sas rgyas dang ldan pa'i yongel bya bas masaMne gyo/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su ma byed de/ dge ba'i pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu yongs su sngo ba 'di no byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyiSha rol tu phyin pa la song pa'i shes rasakyipha rol tu phyin pa sta/ tsho dngaldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bunam
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sams kyis pha rol tu phyin pasAd reg dang/ sems can dang/ byang chub la mtshan mer mo khyod//
mi dmigs pa 'dani byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o//tshe dang
za ldan bshar dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re'i ' gnas shonge/ pha rol tu phyin drug bozams cad sos su rdzogs par byed do//
tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang/ tshad mad pa dang/ gzugs mad ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa
mas yang 1ma par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gags med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang skyong bar ma byed do// bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzug
mad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang mi 'bregalate/bsan gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i debang gis kyang m skye'o//tshadaraldan pa nAr dAti'i
bu 'dazhe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs la mkhas pad 'grogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yabyang/
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsagatan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gak+kugs med pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa dag la dkon par mthong ba dang/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan mamed pa dang/ ny+nyon/
ba mad par mthong bas mnyam par gzhog sta/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha'a mngon du yang ma byed de 2 nyan thosadang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyang Thalegyis gnon to//
tsho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sumasar 'a natho shig la kha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o phebs mkhas pashug cha chen po ste/ tshu dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
de ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da lta go cha chen po bkos pa/
la shar phyogs dang/ lho dang/ nub dang/ bya dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang nub byang dang/ 'og dang/ stong gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga
bye ma snyed dag na/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod patshid du brjod tsong/ mang yos su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'dzage rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go chachen po bgos pa 'di lta ngu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhong yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrugyis rnam par rtsa'i
zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go ka sa pa// tshe dang ldan pa gang po tshel rgyasen byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
dag par zhugs/shes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i theg pa chen po ni gang yini/ gang ngos sbas pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA radA'i bu 'di la byang chub
sams rnapa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sprod de kud snyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ 'dod pas dben sdig tomi ldoge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/
dpyad pa dang bcas// dben phalas skyes pa'i diga' ba dngabade ba can bsam gtan dang po 'phel bar b+hAsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/
bzhi de yanye babasgrubs te gnas so// de nyams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shan tu yangs pa/ mganyis pa// tshad med pa// gcugs mad pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa//
sgo yongs su rdzogs po/ shani tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bakangs mos par byas shing rnam par
gsod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa dang/ dga' ba dang ldan pa dang/ btang snyoms dang/ na pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad mod pa/ gnugs med pa/
nonod pa med pa 2 lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jige rtan chos kyi dbyings kyis klas la/ nam mkha' mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas
par bkang ste chos par gs shang+genan par spyod do// de tshad med pa 'di reg dang/ gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang/ tshul dang Damtshan mas mnyam par
gzhog mang/ rnam par ldang ba'i rgyu yang rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa de du yongs su sngo ba 'ad no/byang chub sems dkA sems dpa' chen po'i sprin pa'i pha rol tuphun pa'o// de bzhani/
du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i 'a rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa rgyu/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang bstan
pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ miganyis pa/ tshod med pa// gzugs med pa
gnod pachod pa/ lhod pa med pa// yongs su rdzogs pa shan phasgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi debangs kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang sa mos
par byas shing rnam par yod do// stong rje dang ldan pa dang/ dga' ba dang ldan pa dang/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ migs pa/ tshad med pa/ gnugs
mad pa/ gnod pa med pa// lhod pa mad pa// yos su rdzogasapa/shan tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs/
zapa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang sta mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de 'dod pas dban sdog te ma dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa// dpyad pa dang bcas pa/
dben pa las skyes pa'i rdega' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang 2 gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa la nye bar
bsgrub te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yas sku mched dang/ rnam shes mtha'i yas skye mched dang/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
mchod la bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems ngang 'a chen bo de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
tshi/ pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rjen bo sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tusngang ba'i phyorebasam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan

kha dril brjod cing 'chad pa dang/ ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/de dag gar dang/ ji dag ga skyen dang 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ thung chub sems dapa/2sems dpa' n
po'i sgron pa'i pha rol tu phan pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de ga gas/ bsam gtan dang/
tshad yod pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhag cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta sta/ nyan thos sam/ rang sas rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems
bskyed pa gzhan rgya gi mo'i byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mams pa 'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gas rnam par sbyod pa'i tsho de 'dra
snyam sa sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zud par bya ba'i phare/ chos bstan te snyam du sems shang yade la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ sems shang
khong du chud par byed pa 'dane byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rgol tu nyan pa'o//nam byang chub sems dang ga sams dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
dang ldan pa'i yar 'drubs/bsam gtan dang/ tshad mad pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gsa rnam par spyod pa'i tshogs sems can thams cad kyi don dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dekyi
'phur brtson 'grus nyams par byed pashad na byang chub sems dang sha sems dpa' chen po'i kirtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'bri dang/ snyoms par 'drug pa rjen sa la mnyam//
'gazhogachung rnam par ldang yang// nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'danebyang chugasams dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi spyi ljol tu phyin pa'o//nam byang chu
sems dang 'a sa mas dpa' chun po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang//
gzhi pa'i yan lagadang/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang sbyong pa'i rnam pa dang
mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang bsam gtanedang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing/ de dag gis
rlom mams med 'di ni byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'o'u 'dzu ne bye nas sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phun pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam
pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'ibaden pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'a jug pa dang/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems bar 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/
mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sebs bsu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag
ra rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cud mkhyen pa
nyid kyi bar du sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di no byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing/ bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol gan
bya/// desnying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang/snying brtse pa'i[>>las su byed do[/]dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam pa//
zagashog tsang/ bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog tsang/ sems can
rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de ]'do no byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad mad pa rnams la sdod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ nam byang
chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang/ tshul dang/mtshan ma la mam par gzhog stong rnam par ldang yang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

tshe da du sngo ba mi gtogs par/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su ma sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dapa'i sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul TAmes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su ma nyams pa'o//nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa de dgags ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing/ sa gnyis po nyan thos
kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mo skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa du mos shing dga' b 'di ni bying rtalasems dang 'asems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la sprod pa'i
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dgegasmos rnams rab tu spang ba dang/
dag ba'i chos phun su tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus ma gtong bas/ rnam par sdod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la sdod pa'i bartson 'grus
kyapha rol tuphyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa 'di dag lo yang nyam paro
gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gakhrugs med pa' sems par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing/ de dag gis ro myong bar byed pa yang mdu la/ de dag
gas 'phrogs par yang ma 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la sngod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ rnamabyang chub sems dpa'
deb mas dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yodi la bya bas bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam
par gzhoke ni rnam par ldang la/ de dag la ma rtag pa dang 2 suka bsngal kAnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ ko' rnam pa dang/ stong pa'i
rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par 'jug pa/
[s ]ma byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshod med pa rnams la sprod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sta/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po'i thig pa chen po'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyi mas dpa' chen pa'i theg pa chen po ni nang stong pa nyid

ra/ shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe

dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu' de ci ga sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgrig chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpasems dapa'i chen po'i theg pachapon/chos thams cad la sems rnam

ma'e khrug ci mnyam par gzhag par shes pasnye tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di bya bsems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po na/ rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag dang/ bdag med pa dang/ sdug dang/
masdug ces bya ba shes pa mi 'jug pa sa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa'i du'adi ni de ma dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshad ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu kazhun yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'dus pa'i dus yashes pa ma 'jug pa dang/ ma'ongs pa dang 2 dzug/ ra gyi dus shes pa 'jug
ga midare/ dus gsum ma dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas 'dapa dus gsum ma shes pa yang med pa 'dzin/tsho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brtems dpa' tshon po' thig ya ni//
'tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i shu kazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po' theg pa chen po na 'dod pa'ikhams su shes 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs
mad pa'i khams su shes pa 'a jug par ma red la/ 'dod parung gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa' khamasam shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang rje tshadamages
